52// Random and guessed values for Internal Spell cast chance
53float spellChanceModifierDispell[12] =
54{
55 1.4f, // None
56 2.5f, // Magic
57 1.8f, // Curse
58 1.5f, // Diseas
59 1.5f, // Poison
60 1.0f, // Stealth
61 1.0f, // Invis
62 2.8f, // All
63 1.0f, // Special
64 2.0f, // Frenzy
65 1.0f, // Unk
66 1.0f, // Unk
67};
68
69float spellChanceModifierType[12] =
70{
71 1.0f, // None
72 0.75f, // Rooted
73 0.75f, // Heal
74 0.75f, // Stun
75 0.50f, // Fear
76 0.75f, // Silence
77 0.95f, // Curse
78 0.95f, // AOE Damage
79 0.95f, // Damage
80 0.75f, // Summon
81 1.0f, // Buff
82 1.0f, // Debuff
83};

160void AIInterface::initialiseScripts(uint32_t entry)
161{
162 // Reset AI Spells
163 if (mCreatureAISpells.size())
164 {
165 for (const auto& spell : mCreatureAISpells)
166 {
167 spell->mCooldownTimer->resetInterval(spell->mCooldown);
168 spell->setCastCount(0);
169 }
170 }
171
172 onLoadScripts.clear();
173 onCombatStartScripts.clear();
174 onAIUpdateScripts.clear();
175 onLeaveCombatScripts.clear();
176 onDiedScripts.clear();
177 onKilledScripts.clear();
178 onCallForHelpScripts.clear();
179 onDamageTakenScripts.clear();
180 onRandomWaypointScripts.clear();
181 onFleeScripts.clear();
182 onTauntScripts.clear();
183
184 mEmotesOnLoad.clear();
185 mEmotesOnCombatStart.clear();
186 mEmotesOnLeaveCombat.clear();
187 mEmotesOnTargetDied.clear();
188 mEmotesOnAIUpdate.clear();
189 mEmotesOnDied.clear();
190 mEmotesOnDamageTaken.clear();
191 mEmotesOnCallForHelp.clear();
192 mEmotesOnFlee.clear();
193 mEmotesOnRandomWaypoint.clear();
194
195 m_canCallForHelp = false;
196 m_canFlee = false;
197
198 auto scripts = sMySQLStore.getCreatureAiScripts(entry);
199
200 for (const auto& aiScripts : *scripts)
201 {
202 uint8_t eventId = aiScripts.event;
203
204 // Skip not in Current Difficulty
205 if (aiScripts.difficulty != 4 && aiScripts.difficulty != getDifficultyType())
206 continue;
207
208 switch (eventId)
209 {
210 case onLoad:
211 {
212 onLoadScripts.push_back(aiScripts);
213 } break;
214 case onEnterCombat:
215 {
216 onCombatStartScripts.push_back(aiScripts);
217 } break;
218 case onLeaveCombat:
219 {
220 onLeaveCombatScripts.push_back(aiScripts);
221 } break;
222 case onDied:
223 {
224 onDiedScripts.push_back(aiScripts);
225 } break;
226 case onTargetDied:
227 {
228 onKilledScripts.push_back(aiScripts);
229 } break;
230 case onAIUpdate:
231 {
232 onAIUpdateScripts.push_back(aiScripts);
233 } break;
234 case onCallForHelp:
235 {
236 onCallForHelpScripts.push_back(aiScripts);
237 m_canCallForHelp = true;
238 m_callForHelpHealth = aiScripts.maxHealth;
239 } break;
240 case onRandomWaypoint:
241 {
242 onRandomWaypointScripts.push_back(aiScripts);
243 } break;
244 case onDamageTaken:
245 {
246 onDamageTakenScripts.push_back(aiScripts);
247 } break;
248 case onFlee:
249 {
250 onFleeScripts.push_back(aiScripts);
251 m_canFlee = true;
252 m_fleeHealth = aiScripts.maxHealth;
253
254 // Incase we want a custom Flee Timer
255 if (aiScripts.misc1)
256 m_fleeDuration = aiScripts.misc1;
257 else
258 m_fleeDuration = 10000;
259 } break;
260 case onTaunt:
261 {
262 onTauntScripts.push_back(aiScripts);
263 } break;
264 default:
265 {
266 sLogger.debugFlag(AscEmu::Logging::LF_SCRIPT_MGR, "unhandled event with eventId {}", eventId);
267 } break;
268 }
269 }
270
271 // Populate Spells
272 addSpellFromDatabase(onLoadScripts);
273 addSpellFromDatabase(onCombatStartScripts);
274 addSpellFromDatabase(onLeaveCombatScripts);
275 addSpellFromDatabase(onAIUpdateScripts);
276 addSpellFromDatabase(onTauntScripts);
277 addSpellFromDatabase(onDiedScripts);
278 addSpellFromDatabase(onKilledScripts);
279 addSpellFromDatabase(onCallForHelpScripts);
280 addSpellFromDatabase(onDamageTakenScripts);
281 addSpellFromDatabase(onFleeScripts);
282
283 // Populate Emotes
284 addEmoteFromDatabase(onLoadScripts, mEmotesOnLoad);
285 addEmoteFromDatabase(onCombatStartScripts, mEmotesOnCombatStart);
286 addEmoteFromDatabase(onLeaveCombatScripts, mEmotesOnLeaveCombat);
287 addEmoteFromDatabase(onDiedScripts, mEmotesOnDied);
288 addEmoteFromDatabase(onKilledScripts, mEmotesOnTargetDied);
289 addEmoteFromDatabase(onAIUpdateScripts, mEmotesOnAIUpdate);
290 addEmoteFromDatabase(onCallForHelpScripts, mEmotesOnCallForHelp);
291 addEmoteFromDatabase(onRandomWaypointScripts, mEmotesOnRandomWaypoint);
292 addEmoteFromDatabase(onDamageTakenScripts, mEmotesOnDamageTaken);
293 addEmoteFromDatabase(onFleeScripts, mEmotesOnFlee);
294 addEmoteFromDatabase(onTauntScripts, mEmotesOnTaunt);
295}
296
297void AIInterface::addEmoteFromDatabase(std::vector<MySQLStructure::CreatureAIScripts> const& scripts, definedEmoteVector& emoteVector)
298{
299 for (const auto& script : scripts)
300 {
301 if (script.action == actionSendMessage)
302 {
303 emoteVector.emplace_back(std::make_unique<AI_SCRIPT_SENDMESSAGES>(
304 script.textId, script.chance, script.phase, script.maxHealth, 0, script.maxCount
305 ));
306 }
307 }
308}
309
310void AIInterface::addSpellFromDatabase(std::vector<MySQLStructure::CreatureAIScripts> const& script)
311{
312 uint8_t spellCounter = 0;
313
314 // Spell Counting for Automated Canche Calculation when needed
315 for (const auto& spell : script)
316 if (spell.spellId)
317 spellCounter++;
318
319 // Add the Spells into our AISpells Array
320 for (const auto& spell : script)
321 {
322 const auto spellInfo = sSpellMgr.getSpellInfo(spell.spellId);
323 float castChance;
324
325 if (spellInfo == nullptr)
326 {
327 sLogger.debug("Tried to Register Creature AI Spell without a valid Spell Id {}", spell.spellId);
328 continue;
329 }
330
331 if (spell.chance)
332 castChance = spell.chance;
333 else
334 castChance = ((75.0f / static_cast<float_t>(spellCounter)) * spellChanceModifierDispell[spellInfo->getDispelType()] * spellChanceModifierType[spell.spell_type]);
335
336 sLogger.debugFlag(AscEmu::Logging::DebugFlags::LF_SPELL, "spell {} chance {}", spell.spellId, castChance);
337
338 auto spellCooldown = Util::getRandomUInt(spell.cooldownMin, spell.cooldownMax);
339 if (spellCooldown == 0)
340 spellCooldown = spellInfo->getSpellDefaultDuration(nullptr);
341
342 // Ready add to our List
343 if (hasAISpell(spell.spellId))
344 continue;
345
346 // Create AI Spell
347 const auto& newAISpell = mCreatureAISpells.emplace_back(std::make_unique<CreatureAISpells>(spellInfo, castChance, spell.target, spellInfo->getSpellDefaultDuration(nullptr), spellCooldown, false, spell.triggered));
348
349 if (spell.textId)
350 newAISpell->addDBEmote(spell.textId);
351
352 newAISpell->setMaxCastCount(spell.maxCount);
353 newAISpell->scriptType = spell.event;
354 newAISpell->spell_type = AI_SpellType(spell.spell_type);
355 newAISpell->fromDB = true;
356
357 if (spell.maxHealth)
358 newAISpell->setMinMaxPercentHp(spell.minHealth, spell.maxHealth);
359 }
360}

377void AIInterface::handleEvent(uint32_t event, Unit* pUnit, uint32_t misc1)
378{
379 if (m_Unit == nullptr)
380 return;
381
382 if (event < NUM_AI_EVENTS && AIEventHandlers[event] != NULL)
383 (*this.*AIEventHandlers[event])(pUnit, misc1);
384}
385
386void AIInterface::update(unsigned long time_passed)
387{
388 if (m_Unit->isPlayer() || !m_Unit->IsInWorld())
389 return;
390
391 // Call AIUpdate
392 m_Unit->ToCreature()->CallScriptUpdate(time_passed);
393
394 if (!m_Unit->isAIEnabled())
395 return;
396
397 if (m_canEnterCombat)
398 {
399 m_targetUpdateTimer->updateTimer(time_passed);
400 if (m_targetUpdateTimer->isTimePassed())
401 {
402 m_targetUpdateTimer->resetInterval(TARGET_UPDATE_TIMER);
403 _updateTargets();
404 }
405
406 // When we dont Have Any Targets do Nothing
407 if (!_updateCurrentTarget())
408 {
409 // Handle autocasted summon spells that dont require combat
410 if (m_Unit->isSummon() && m_Unit->getPlayerOwner() != nullptr)
411 updateOutOfCombatSpells(time_passed);
412 return;
413 }
414
415 // Update Database AI Scripts
416 updateAIScript(time_passed);
417
418 // Cast a Spell,Do Ranged or simply Melee
419 if (m_Unit->isTotem())
420 updateTotem(time_passed);
421 else
422 updateAgent(time_passed);
423 }
424 else
425 {
426 // Wipe targets
427 // Remove Combat
428 if (m_Unit->isInCombat())
429 enterEvadeMode();
430 }
431
432 // Timed Emotes
433 updateEmotes(time_passed);
434}
435
436void AIInterface::updateAIScript(unsigned long time_passed)
437{
438 mSpellWaitTimer->updateTimer(time_passed);
439
440 // Update Spells
441 if (m_Unit->isInCombat() || m_Unit->isPet())
442 {
443 // Update Internal Spell Timers
444 for (const auto& spells : mCreatureAISpells)
445 {
446 if (!m_Unit->isCastingSpell())
447 spells->mCooldownTimer->updateTimer(time_passed);
448
449 spells->mDurationTimer->updateTimer(time_passed);
450 }
451
452 UpdateAISpells();
453 }
454
455 // On AIUpdate Scripts
456 for (auto itr = onAIUpdateScripts.begin(); itr != onAIUpdateScripts.end(); ++itr)
457 {
458 uint8_t actionId = itr->action;
459
460 switch (actionId)
461 {
462 case actionPhaseChange:
463 if (itr->phase > 0 || itr->phase == internalPhase)
464 {
465 if (static_cast<float>(m_Unit->getHealthPct()) <= itr->maxHealth && itr->maxCount)
466 {
467 internalPhase = static_cast<uint8_t>(itr->misc1);
468
469 itr->maxCount = itr->maxCount - 1U;
470
471 if (const auto npcScriptText = sMySQLStore.getNpcScriptText(itr->textId))
472 {
473 m_Unit->sendChatMessage(npcScriptText->type, LANG_UNIVERSAL, npcScriptText->text);
474
475 if (npcScriptText->sound != 0)
476 m_Unit->PlaySoundToSet(npcScriptText->sound);
477 }
478 }
479 }
480 break;
481 default:
482 break;
483 }
484 }
485
486 // Send a Chatmessage from our AI Scripts
487 sendStoredText(mEmotesOnAIUpdate, nullptr);
488}
489
490void AIInterface::updateEmotes(unsigned long time_passed)
491{
492 if (!m_Unit->getThreatManager().getCurrentVictim() && m_Unit->isAlive())
493 {
494 if (timed_emote_expire <= time_passed) // note that creature might go idle and time_passed might get big next time ...We do not skip emotes because of lost time
495 {
496 if ((*next_timed_emote)->type == 1) //standstate
497 {
498 m_Unit->setStandState(static_cast<uint8_t>((*next_timed_emote)->value));
499 m_Unit->setEmoteState(0);
500 }
501 else if ((*next_timed_emote)->type == 2) //emotestate
502 {
503 m_Unit->setEmoteState((*next_timed_emote)->value);
504 m_Unit->setStandState(STANDSTATE_STAND);
505 }
506 else if ((*next_timed_emote)->type == 3) //oneshot emote
507 {
508 m_Unit->setEmoteState(0);
509 m_Unit->setStandState(STANDSTATE_STAND);
510 m_Unit->emote(static_cast<EmoteType>((*next_timed_emote)->value)); // Animation
511 }
512
513 if ((*next_timed_emote)->msg.length())
514 m_Unit->sendChatMessage((*next_timed_emote)->msg_type, (*next_timed_emote)->msg_lang, (*next_timed_emote)->msg.c_str());
515
516 timed_emote_expire = (*next_timed_emote)->expire_after; //should we keep lost time ? I think not
517 ++next_timed_emote;
518
519 if (next_timed_emote == timed_emotes->end())
520 next_timed_emote = timed_emotes->begin();
521 }
522 else
523 {
524 timed_emote_expire -= time_passed;
525 }
526 }
527}

529//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
530// Combat
531
532void AIInterface::combatStart(Unit* target)
533{
534 if (!m_Unit->getThreatManager().canHaveThreatList())
535 return;
536
537 if (m_isEngaged)
538 {
539 sLogger.debug("AIInterface::onCombatStart called but creature is already inCombat");
540 return;
541 }
542
543 m_isEngaged = true;
544
545 // dismount if mounted
546 if (m_Unit->isCreature() && !(static_cast<Creature*>(m_Unit)->GetCreatureProperties()->typeFlags & CREATURE_FLAG1_FIGHT_MOUNTED))
547 m_Unit->dismount();
548
549 // make AI group attack
550 if (const auto* group = sMySQLStore.getSpawnGroupDataBySpawn(m_Unit->ToCreature()->getSpawnId()))
551 {
552 for (const auto& members : group->spawns)
553 {
554 if (members.second && members.second->isAlive() && members.second->IsInWorld())
555 members.second->getAIInterface()->onHostileAction(target, nullptr, false);
556 }
557 }
558
559 const auto movetype = m_Unit->getMovementManager()->getCurrentMovementGeneratorType();
560 if (movetype == WAYPOINT_MOTION_TYPE || movetype == POINT_MOTION_TYPE)
561 m_Unit->SetSpawnLocation(m_Unit->GetPosition());
562
563 if (auto* const formation = m_Unit->ToCreature()->getFormation())
564 formation->memberEngagingTarget(m_Unit->ToCreature(), target);
565
566 // find assistance
567 findFriends(64.0f /* 8 yards */);
568
569 setDefaultBoundary();
570
571 handleEvent(EVENT_ENTERCOMBAT, target, 0);
572}
573
574void AIInterface::combatStop()
575{
576 if (!m_isEngaged)
577 {
578 sLogger.debug("AIInterface::onCombatStop called but creature is not inCombat");
579 return;
580 }
581 m_isEngaged = false;
582 m_isEngagedByAssist = false;
583
584 internalPhase = 0;
585 spellEvents.resetEvents();
586 m_UnitToFollow = nullptr;
587 m_cannotReachTarget = false;
588
589 m_hasCalledForHelp = false;
590 m_hasFleed = false;
591 m_fleeState = FLEE_NONE;
592 m_fleeTimer->resetInterval(0);
593 m_AiCurrentAgent = AGENT_NULL;
594
595 m_Unit->getThreatManager().clearAllThreat();
596 m_Unit->getThreatManager().removeMeFromThreatLists();
597
598 attackStop();
599
600 m_assistTargets.clear();
601
602 if (!m_disableDynamicBoundary)
603 m_boundaries.clear();
604
605 // Remove Instance Combat
606 instanceCombatProgress(false);
607}
608
609void AIInterface::onHostileAction(Unit* pUnit, SpellInfo const* spellInfo/* = nullptr*/, bool ignoreThreatRedirects/* = false*/)
610{
611 // Do not aggro self
612 if (m_Unit == pUnit)
613 return;
614
615 const auto wasEngaged = m_isEngaged;
616
617 if (m_Unit->getThreatManager().canHaveThreatList())
618 {
619 // Add initial threat
620 m_Unit->getThreatManager().addThreat(pUnit, 0.0f, spellInfo, true, ignoreThreatRedirects);
621 }
622 else if (m_Unit->isPet() && m_currentTarget == nullptr)
623 {
624 // Make pet react to attacker
625 if (m_reactState == REACT_AGGRESSIVE || m_reactState == REACT_DEFENSIVE)
626 attackStartIfCan(pUnit);
627 }
628
629 // Update combat for pure creatures only
630 if (m_Unit->getPlayerOwner() == nullptr)
631 m_Unit->getCombatHandler().onHostileAction(pUnit);
632
633 // Let players know that creature has aggroed them
634 // Pure creature targets do not need this
635 if (pUnit->getPlayerOwnerOrSelf() != nullptr)
636 pUnit->getCombatHandler().takeCombatAction(m_Unit);
637
638 // Send hostile action event if unit was already engaged
639 // no need to send this if unit just started combat
640 if (wasEngaged)
641 handleEvent(EVENT_HOSTILEACTION, pUnit, 0);
642}
643
644void AIInterface::setCurrentTarget(Unit* pUnit) { m_currentTarget = pUnit; }
645
646Unit* AIInterface::findTarget()
647{
648 // find nearest hostile Target to attack
649 if (!m_Unit->IsInWorld())
650 return nullptr;
651
652 //target is immune to all form of attacks, cant attack either.
653 // not attackable creatures sometimes fight enemies in scripted fights though
654 if (m_Unit->hasUnitFlags(UNIT_FLAG_NOT_SELECTABLE | UNIT_FLAG_NON_ATTACKABLE))
655 return nullptr;
656
657 if (m_reactState != REACT_AGGRESSIVE)
658 return nullptr;
659
660 // Should not look for new target while creature is in these states
661 if (m_Unit->hasUnitStateFlag(UNIT_STATE_STUNNED | UNIT_STATE_FLEEING | UNIT_STATE_CONFUSED | UNIT_STATE_POLYMORPHED | UNIT_STATE_EVADING))
662 return nullptr;
663
664 Unit* target = nullptr;
665 Unit* critterTarget = nullptr;
666
667 float distance = 999999.0f; // that should do it.. :p
668
669 for (const auto& itr2 : m_Unit->getInRangeObjectsSet())
670 {
671 if (itr2)
672 {
673 if (!itr2->isCreatureOrPlayer())
674 continue;
675
676 Unit* pUnit = static_cast<Unit*>(itr2);
677
678 // Must be hostile, not neutral, to target
679 if (!m_Unit->isHostileTo(pUnit))
680 continue;
681
682 if (!canOwnerAttackUnit(pUnit))
683 continue;
684
685 if (worldConfig.terrainCollision.isCollisionEnabled)
686 {
687 if (!m_Unit->IsWithinLOSInMap(pUnit))
688 continue;
689 }
690
691 //on blizz there is no Z limit check
692 const float dist = m_Unit->GetDistance2dSq(pUnit);
693
694 if (pUnit->m_factionTemplate != nullptr && pUnit->m_factionTemplate->Faction == 28)// only Attack a critter if there is no other Enemy in range
695 {
696 if (dist < 10.0f)
697 critterTarget = pUnit;
698
699 continue;
700 }
701
702 if (dist > calcAggroRange(pUnit))
703 continue;
704
705 // Do not aggro flying stuff that cannot be reached
706 if (!m_Unit->canFly() && (m_Unit->getDistanceZ(pUnit) > (3 + m_Unit->getMeleeRange(pUnit))))
707 continue;
708
709 if (dist > distance) // we want to find the CLOSEST target
710 continue;
711
712 distance = dist;
713 target = pUnit;
714 }
715 }
716
717 if (target == nullptr)
718 target = critterTarget;
719
720 if (target != nullptr)
721 onHostileAction(target);
722
723 return target;
724}
725
726void AIInterface::findFriends(float sqrtRange)
727{
728 auto* const currentTarget = m_currentTarget != nullptr
729 ? m_currentTarget
730 : m_AiCurrentAgent == AGENT_FLEE ? _selectCurrentTarget() : nullptr;
731 if (!m_Unit->IsInWorld() || currentTarget == nullptr)
732 return;
733
734 // Quick check - neutral mob cannot call for assist
735 // TODO: maybe not on periodical pulses, but what if they use call for help or flee agent
736 if (!m_Unit->isHostileTo(currentTarget))
737 return;
738
739 for (const auto& itr : m_Unit->getInRangeObjectsSet())
740 {
741 if (itr != nullptr && itr->isCreature())
742 {
743 Creature* helper = itr->ToCreature();
744 if (isAlreadyAssisting(helper) || helper->getAIInterface()->isAlreadyAssisting(m_Unit))
745 continue;
746
747 if (m_Unit->getDistanceSq(helper) > sqrtRange)
748 continue;
749
750 // Helper must be hostile to current target
751 // Neutral mobs cannot assist other neutral mobs
752 if (!helper->isHostileTo(currentTarget))
753 continue;
754
755 if (!helper->getAIInterface()->canOwnerAssistUnit(m_Unit))
756 continue;
757
758 if (worldConfig.terrainCollision.isCollisionEnabled)
759 {
760 if (!m_Unit->IsWithinLOSInMap(helper))
761 continue;
762 }
763
764 m_assistTargets.insert(helper);
765
766 if (!helper->isInCombat())
767 {
768 helper->getAIInterface()->setEngagedByAssist();
769 helper->getAIInterface()->onHostileAction(currentTarget);
770 }
771 }
772 }
773}
774
775bool AIInterface::canOwnerAttackUnit(Unit* pUnit) const
776{
777 if (pUnit == nullptr || !pUnit->IsInWorld())
778 return false;
779
780 if (pUnit == m_Unit)
781 return false;
782
783 if (!m_Unit->isAlive() || !pUnit->isAlive())
784 return false;
785
786 if (!m_Unit->isValidTarget(pUnit))
787 return false;
788
789 if (pUnit->hasUnitFlags(UNIT_FLAG_NON_ATTACKABLE | UNIT_FLAG_NOT_SELECTABLE))
790 return false;
791
792 if (pUnit->hasUnitStateFlag(UNIT_STATE_UNATTACKABLE))
793 return false;
794
795 // Ignore player owned creatures
796 if (isIgnoringCreatureCombat() && pUnit->isCreature() && !pUnit->hasUnitFlags(UNIT_FLAG_PVP_ATTACKABLE))
797 return false;
798
799 // Check also for player owned creatures
800 if (isIgnoringPlayerCombat() && (pUnit->isPlayer() || pUnit->hasUnitFlags(UNIT_FLAG_PVP_ATTACKABLE)))
801 return false;
802
803 if (m_Unit->isInEvadeMode())
804 return false;
805
806 if (auto* const creatureTarget = pUnit->ToCreature())
807 {
808 if (creatureTarget->GetCreatureProperties()->Type == UNIT_TYPE_NONCOMBAT_PET)
809 return false;
810
811 if (creatureTarget->isInEvadeMode())
812 return false;
813 }
814
815 if (const auto* plrTarget = pUnit->ToPlayer())
816 {
817 if (plrTarget->isGMFlagSet())
818 return false;
819
820 if (plrTarget->m_isGmInvisible)
821 return false;
822
823 if (plrTarget->isOnTaxi())
824 return false;
825 }
826
827 if (!pUnit->isInAccessiblePlaceFor(m_Unit->ToCreature()))
828 return false;
829
830 // Script Interface Function
831 if (m_Unit->ToCreature()->GetScript() != nullptr)
832 {
833 if (!m_Unit->ToCreature()->GetScript()->canAttackTarget(pUnit))
834 return false;
835 }
836
837#if VERSION_STRING == Classic
838 if (pUnit->hasUnitFlags(UNIT_FLAG_FEIGN_DEATH))
839#else
840 if (pUnit->hasUnitFlags(UNIT_FLAG_FEIGN_DEATH) || pUnit->hasUnitFlags2(UNIT_FLAG2_FEIGN_DEATH))
841#endif
842 {
843 // Guards can detect feign death
844 // TODO: other than guards can also detect but its based on chance
845 if (!isGuard())
846 return false;
847 }
848
849#ifdef FT_VEHICLES
850 if (m_Unit->getVehicle() && (m_Unit->isOnVehicle(pUnit) || m_Unit->getVehicle()->getBase()->isOnVehicle(pUnit)))
851 return false;
852#endif
853
854 if (!m_Unit->isCharmed())
855 {
856 if (m_Unit->getWorldMap()->getBaseMap()->isInstanceMap())
857 return true;
858
859 if (!(m_Unit->ToCreature()->GetCreatureProperties()->typeFlags & CREATURE_FLAG1_BOSS) != 0 || m_Unit->hasAuraWithAuraEffect(SPELL_AURA_MOD_TAUNT))
860 return true;
861 }
862
863 // Map Visibility Range but not more than the Distance of 2 Cells
864 auto distance = std::min<float>(m_Unit->getWorldMap()->getVisibilityRange(), Map::Cell::cellSize * 2);
865
866 if (auto* const unit = m_Unit->getUnitOwner())
867 {
868 return pUnit->IsWithinDistInMap(unit, distance);
869 }
870 else
871 {
872 // include sizes for huge npcs
873 distance += m_Unit->getCombatReach() + pUnit->getCombatReach();
874
875 // to prevent creatures in air ignore attacks because distance is already too high...
876 if (m_Unit->ToCreature()->getMovementTemplate().isFlightAllowed())
877 return pUnit->isInDist2d(m_Unit->GetSpawnPosition(), distance);
878 else
879 return pUnit->isInDist(m_Unit->GetSpawnPosition(), distance);
880 }
881}
882
883bool AIInterface::canOwnerAssistUnit(Unit* pUnit) const
884{
885 if (!m_Unit->isAlive())
886 return false;
887
888 // Already in combat
889 if (m_isEngaged)
890 return false;
891
892 if (m_Unit->hasUnitFlags(UNIT_FLAG_NON_ATTACKABLE | UNIT_FLAG_NOT_SELECTABLE))
893 return false;
894
895 if (isIgnoringCreatureCombat())
896 return false;
897
898 if (m_Unit->isInEvadeMode())
899 return false;
900
901 auto* const creatureTarget = pUnit->ToCreature();
902 if (creatureTarget != nullptr)
903 {
904 // TODO: is this necessary check? dont think mobs are looking for friends in evade mode
905 if (creatureTarget->isInEvadeMode())
906 return false;
907 }
908
909 if (m_reactState != REACT_AGGRESSIVE)
910 return false;
911
912 // Summons will only assist master
913 if (m_Unit->getUnitOwner() != nullptr)
914 return false;
915
916 // Must be same faction
917 if (m_Unit->getFactionTemplate() != pUnit->getFactionTemplate())
918 return false;
919
920 auto* const creatureUnit = m_Unit->ToCreature();
921 if (creatureUnit != nullptr)
922 {
923 // Beasts can only assist same family beasts
924 if (creatureUnit->GetCreatureProperties()->Type == UNIT_TYPE_BEAST)
925 {
926 if (creatureTarget == nullptr)
927 return false;
928 if (creatureTarget->GetCreatureProperties()->Type != UNIT_TYPE_BEAST)
929 return false;
930 if (creatureTarget->GetCreatureProperties()->Family != creatureUnit->GetCreatureProperties()->Family)
931 return false;
932 }
933 }
934
935 // TODO: if mob has faction 14 it cant call for assist because isFriendlyTo returns always false
936 // because that faction is not friends with itself or any other faction in dbc
937 // hackfix: if faction 14 and mobs are same entry, it can assist -Appled
938 if (creatureUnit != nullptr && creatureTarget != nullptr)
939 {
940 if (creatureUnit->getFactionTemplate() == 14 && creatureUnit->getEntry() == creatureTarget->getEntry())
941 return true;
942 }
943
944 // Logical check
945 if (!m_Unit->isFriendlyTo(pUnit))
946 return false;
947
948 return true;
949}
950
951bool AIInterface::isAlreadyAssisting(Unit const* helper) const
952{
953 return m_assistTargets.find(helper) != m_assistTargets.cend();
954}
955
956bool AIInterface::isEngaged() const { return m_isEngaged; }
957void AIInterface::setEngagedByAssist() { m_isEngagedByAssist = true; }
958
959void AIInterface::enterEvadeMode()
960{
961 if (m_Unit->isInEvadeMode())
962 return;
963
964 // Player pets should not evade but instead stop attacking and return to owner
965 if (m_Unit->isPet() && m_Unit->getPlayerOwner() != nullptr)
966 {
967 // TODO: not handled! -Appled
968 //static_cast<Pet*>(m_Unit)->HandleAutoCastEvent(AUTOCAST_EVENT_LEAVE_COMBAT);
969
970 attackStop();
971 // TODO: not correct, if pet is at stay, it should return to stay location
972 dynamic_cast<Pet*>(m_Unit)->setPetAction(PET_ACTION_FOLLOW);
973 m_PetOwner = m_Unit->getUnitOwner();
974 handleEvent(EVENT_FOLLOWOWNER, nullptr, 0);
975 }
976
977 combatStop();
978
979 if (!m_Unit->isAlive())
980 {
981 handleEvent(EVENT_UNITDIED, m_Unit, 0);
982 return;
983 }
984
985 handleEvent(EVENT_LEAVECOMBAT, m_Unit, 0);
986
987 // Clear tagger on evade
988 // Reset it here instead of combatStop so it's not called on unit death
989 m_Unit->setTaggerGuid(nullptr);
990
991 if (m_Unit->isAlive())
992 {
993 if (m_Unit->getUnitOwner() == nullptr)
994 m_Unit->addUnitStateFlag(UNIT_STATE_EVADING);
995
996 m_Unit->getMovementManager()->moveTargetedHome();
997 }
998}
999
1000bool AIInterface::canReachTarget() const { return !m_cannotReachTarget; }
1001void AIInterface::setCannotReachTarget(bool cannotReach)
1002{
1003 if (cannotReach == m_cannotReachTarget)
1004 return;
1005
1006 m_cannotReachTarget = cannotReach;
1007 m_cannotReachTimer->resetInterval(5000);
1008}
1009
1010void AIInterface::addBoundary(std::unique_ptr<AreaBoundary const> boundary, bool overrideDefault/* = false*/, bool reverseBoundary /*= false*/)
1011{
1012 if (boundary == nullptr)
1013 return;
1014
1015 if (overrideDefault && !m_disableDynamicBoundary)
1016 {
1017 // On first custom boundary, clear existing default/dynamic boundaries
1018 m_boundaries.clear();
1019 m_disableDynamicBoundary = true;
1020 }
1021
1022 m_boundaries.push_back(std::move(boundary));
1023 m_reverseBoundary = reverseBoundary;
1024 // Check boundary on next update
1025 m_boundaryCheckTime->resetInterval(0);
1026}
1027
1028void AIInterface::setDefaultBoundary()
1029{
1030 if (m_disableDynamicBoundary)
1031 return;
1032
1033 // Do net set default boundaries to creatures in raids or dungeons
1034 // Mobs and bosses will chase players to instance portal unless custom boundaries are set
1035 if (m_Unit->getWorldMap()->getBaseMap()->isInstanceMap())
1036 return;
1037
1038 if (m_Unit->isSummon())
1039 return;
1040
1041 // Clear existing boundaries
1042 m_boundaries.clear();
1043
1044 // Default boundary 50 yards
1045 addBoundary(std::make_unique<CircleBoundary>(m_Unit->GetPosition(), 50.0f));
1046}
1047
1048bool AIInterface::isWithinBoundary() const
1049{
1050 return isWithinBoundary(m_Unit->GetPosition());
1051}
1052
1053bool AIInterface::isWithinBoundary(LocationVector const& pos) const
1054{
1055 if (m_boundaries.empty())
1056 return true;
1057
1058 for (const auto& boundary : m_boundaries)
1059 {
1060 if (!boundary->isWithinBoundary(pos))
1061 return m_reverseBoundary ? true : false;
1062 }
1063
1064 return m_reverseBoundary ? false : true;
1065}

1068bool AIInterface::isIgnoringPlayerCombat() const { return m_Unit->hasUnitFlags(UNIT_FLAG_IGNORE_PLAYER_COMBAT); }

1074 else

1076}

1082 else
1083 m_Unit->removeUnitFlags(UNIT_FLAG_IGNORE_PLAYER_COMBAT);
1084}

1086bool AIInterface::isAllowedToEnterCombat() const { return m_canEnterCombat; }

1091 setIgnorePlayerCombat(!value);
1092 m_canEnterCombat = value;
1093}
1094
1095void AIInterface::_updateTargets()
1096{
1097 // While fleeing creature searches for friend from larger radius every 1.5s
1098 if (m_AiCurrentAgent == AGENT_FLEE)
1099 {
1100 _findFriendWhileFleeing();
1101 return;
1102 }
1103 // Do not update target while confused or fleeing but try find friends
1104 else if (m_Unit->hasUnitStateFlag(UNIT_STATE_CONFUSED | UNIT_STATE_FLEEING))
1105 {
1106 findFriends(64.0f /* 8 yards */);
1107 return;
1108 }
1109
1110 // Hostile NPCs look for attackable unit every 1.5s when out of combat
1111 // When in combat they look for friendly units to assist it every 1.5s
1112
1113 // Find Target when no Threat List is available
1114 if (!m_isEngaged && m_reactState == REACT_AGGRESSIVE)
1115 findTarget();
1116
1117 if (m_isEngaged || m_currentTarget != nullptr)
1118 {
1119 if (_canEvade())
1120 {
1121 enterEvadeMode();
1122 return;
1123 }
1124
1125 findFriends(64.0f /* 8 yards */);
1126
1127 // Clear Assist Targets
1128 if (m_assistTargets.size())
1129 {
1130 for (auto i = m_assistTargets.begin(); i != m_assistTargets.end();)
1131 {
1132 auto i2 = i++;
1133 if ((*i2) == nullptr ||
1134 (*i2)->event_GetCurrentInstanceId() != m_Unit->event_GetCurrentInstanceId() ||
1135 (*i2)->GetMapId() != m_Unit->GetMapId() ||
1136 !(*i2)->isAlive() || m_Unit->getDistanceSq((*i2)) >= 2500.0f ||
1137 (*i2)->isInEvadeMode() || !((*i2)->m_phase & m_Unit->m_phase))
1138 {
1139 m_assistTargets.erase(i2);
1140 }
1141 }
1142 }
1143 }
1144}
1145
1146bool AIInterface::_updateCurrentTarget()
1147{
1148 if (!m_isEngaged && m_currentTarget == nullptr)
1149 return false;
1150
1151 if (!m_Unit->isAlive())
1152 {
1153 combatStop();
1154 return false;
1155 }
1156
1157 if (m_reactState != REACT_PASSIVE || (m_Unit->isSummon() && m_Unit->getPlayerOwner() != nullptr))
1158 {
1159 auto* const victim = _selectCurrentTarget();
1160 if (!canOwnerAttackUnit(victim))
1161 {
1162 // Something has made current target no longer attackable
1163 enterEvadeMode();
1164 return false;
1165 }
1166
1167 // Someone else has become primary target, attack it
1168 if (victim != m_currentTarget)
1169 attackStartUnsafe(victim);
1170
1171 return m_currentTarget != nullptr;
1172 }
1173 else if (!m_Unit->isInCombat())
1174 {
1175 enterEvadeMode();
1176 return false;
1177 }
1178 else if (m_currentTarget != nullptr)
1179 {
1180 attackStop();
1181 }
1182
1183 return true;
1184}
1185
1186Unit* AIInterface::_selectCurrentTarget() const
1187{
1188 Unit* victim = nullptr;
1189 if (m_Unit->getThreatManager().canHaveThreatList())
1190 victim = m_Unit->getThreatManager().getCurrentVictim();
1191 else
1192 victim = m_currentTarget;
1193
1194 return victim;
1195}
1196
1197bool AIInterface::_canEvade() const
1198{
1199 // Already evading
1200 if (m_Unit->isInEvadeMode())
1201 return false;
1202
1203 // If unit cant find path to target wait 4 seconds before evading
1204 if (m_cannotReachTarget && !m_Unit->getWorldMap()->getBaseMap()->isRaid())
1205 {
1206 m_cannotReachTimer->updateTimer(TARGET_UPDATE_TIMER);
1207 if (m_cannotReachTimer->isTimePassed())
1208 return true;
1209 }
1210
1211 if (m_currentTarget == nullptr)
1212 {
1213 // If current target does not exist wait 3 seconds before evading
1214 m_noTargetTimer->updateTimer(TARGET_UPDATE_TIMER);
1215 if (m_noTargetTimer->isTimePassed())
1216 {
1217 m_noTargetTimer->resetInterval(3000);
1218 return true;
1219 }
1220 }
1221 else
1222 {
1223 // If current target is not in same map
1224 if (m_currentTarget->GetMapId() != m_Unit->GetMapId())
1225 return true;
1226 }
1227
1228 // Check boundaries every 3 seconds
1229 m_boundaryCheckTime->updateTimer(TARGET_UPDATE_TIMER);
1230 if (m_boundaryCheckTime->isTimePassed())
1231 {
1232 if (!isWithinBoundary(m_Unit->GetPosition()))
1233 {
1234 m_boundaryCheckTime->resetInterval(3000);
1235 return true;
1236 }
1237 }
1238
1239 return false;
1240}
1241
1242//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
1243// Combat AI
1244
1245void AIInterface::attackStartIfCan(Unit* target)
1246{
1247 if (!canOwnerAttackUnit(target))
1248 return;
1249
1250 attackStartUnsafe(target);
1251}
1252
1253void AIInterface::attackStartUnsafe(Unit* target)
1254{
1255 if (target == nullptr)
1256 return;
1257
1258 if (auto* creatureUnit = m_Unit->ToCreature())
1259 {
1260 if (creatureUnit->GetScript() != nullptr && creatureUnit->GetScript()->onAttackStart(target))
1261 return;
1262 }
1263
1264 if (m_currentTarget != nullptr)
1265 {
1266 if (m_currentTarget == target)
1267 {
1268 // Creature is already melee attacking this target
1269 if (m_Unit->hasUnitStateFlag(UNIT_STATE_MELEE_ATTACKING))
1270 return;
1271 }
1272 else
1273 {
1274 // Creature is already attacking someone else
1275 m_Unit->interruptSpellWithSpellType(CURRENT_MELEE_SPELL);
1276 // TODO: should this be sent since we are switching target?
1277 m_Unit->smsg_AttackStop(target);
1278 }
1279 }
1280
1281 m_currentTarget = target;
1282 m_Unit->setTargetGuid(target->getGuid());
1283
1284 // updateAgent will set this correctly later
1285 m_Unit->addUnitStateFlag(UNIT_STATE_MELEE_ATTACKING);
1286
1287 const auto wasEngaged = m_isEngaged;
1288 onHostileAction(target, nullptr, true);
1289
1290 if (wasEngaged)
1291 m_Unit->smsg_AttackStart(target);
1292
1293 if (m_Unit->isPet() && m_Unit->getPlayerOwner() != nullptr)
1294 m_Unit->addUnitFlags(UNIT_FLAG_PET_IN_COMBAT);
1295
1296 // Clear distracted state on attacking
1297 if (m_Unit->hasUnitStateFlag(UNIT_STATE_DISTRACTED))
1298 {
1299 m_Unit->removeUnitStateFlag(UNIT_STATE_DISTRACTED);
1300 m_Unit->getMovementManager()->clear();
1301 }
1302 m_Unit->getMovementManager()->moveChase(target);
1303}
1304
1305void AIInterface::attackStop()
1306{
1307 if (m_currentTarget == nullptr)
1308 return;
1309
1310 auto* const target = m_currentTarget;
1311 m_currentTarget = nullptr;
1312 m_Unit->setTargetGuid(0);
1313
1314 m_Unit->removeUnitStateFlag(UNIT_STATE_MELEE_ATTACKING);
1315 m_Unit->smsg_AttackStop(target);
1316
1317 if (m_Unit->isPet() && m_Unit->getPlayerOwner() != nullptr)
1318 m_Unit->removeUnitFlags(UNIT_FLAG_PET_IN_COMBAT);
1319}
1320
1321//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
1322// Agent AI
1323
1324bool AIInterface::canFlee() const
1325{
1326 if (!m_canFlee)
1327 return false;
1328
1329 // Already fled once
1330 if (m_hasFleed)
1331 return false;
1332
1333 if (static_cast<float>(m_Unit->getHealthPct()) > m_fleeHealth)
1334 return false;
1335
1336 if (m_Unit->hasAuraWithAuraEffect(SPELL_AURA_PREVENTS_FLEEING))
1337 return false;
1338
1339 return true;
1340}
1341
1342void AIInterface::setCanFlee(bool value) { m_canFlee = value; }
1343
1344void AIInterface::stopFleeing()
1345{
1346 m_reactState = REACT_AGGRESSIVE;
1347 m_fleeTimer->resetInterval(0);
1348 findFriends(100.0f /* 10 yards */);
1349}
1350
1351bool AIInterface::canCallForHelp() const
1352{
1353 if (!m_canCallForHelp)
1354 return false;
1355
1356 // Already called for help once
1357 if (m_hasCalledForHelp)
1358 return false;
1359
1360 if (static_cast<float>(m_Unit->getHealthPct()) > m_callForHelpHealth)
1361 return false;
1362
1363 return true;
1364}
1365
1366void AIInterface::setCanCallForHelp(bool value) { m_canCallForHelp = value; }
1367void AIInterface::setCallForHelpHealth(float health) { m_callForHelpHealth = health; }
1368
1369void AIInterface::handleAgentFlee(uint32_t p_time)
1370{
1371 if (m_Unit->isInEvadeMode())
1372 return;
1373
1374 auto* const creatureUnit = m_Unit->ToCreature();
1375 if (creatureUnit == nullptr)
1376 return;
1377
1378 m_fleeTimer->updateTimer(p_time);
1379 if (m_fleeTimer->isTimePassed() && m_hasFleed)
1380 {
1381 m_Unit->setControlled(false, UNIT_STATE_FLEEING);
1382 m_AiCurrentAgent = AGENT_NULL;
1383 m_fleeState = FLEE_NONE;
1384 }
1385
1386 if (m_hasFleed)
1387 return;
1388
1389 m_fleeTimer->resetInterval(m_fleeDuration);
1390
1391 if (m_Unit->IsInWorld() && creatureUnit->GetScript())
1392 creatureUnit->GetScript()->OnFlee(m_currentTarget);
1393
1394 // On Flee Scripts
1395 for (const auto& onFleeScript : onFleeScripts)
1396 {
1397 if (onFleeScript.action == actionSpell)
1398 {
1399 castAISpell(onFleeScript.spellId);
1400 }
1401 }
1402
1403 // Send a Chatmessage from our AI Scripts or general "%s attempts to run away in fear!"
1404 if (!mEmotesOnFlee.empty())
1405 sendStoredText(mEmotesOnFlee, m_Unit);
1406 else
1407 creatureUnit->SendScriptTextChatMessage(9670, m_Unit);
1408
1409 // Creature starts fleeing movement generator and periodically tries to find a friend nearby
1410 // If friend is found, creature will stop fleeing and run towards that friend
1411 if (!_findFriendWhileFleeing())
1412 {
1413 m_fleeState = FLEE_RANDOM_MOVE;
1414 m_Unit->setControlled(true, UNIT_STATE_FLEEING);
1415 }
1416
1417 m_hasFleed = true;
1418}
1419
1420void AIInterface::handleAgentCallForHelp()
1421{
1422 if (m_hasCalledForHelp)
1423 return;
1424
1425 if (m_Unit->isCreature())
1426 {
1427 // On Call for Help Scripts
1428 for (const auto& onCallForHelpScript : onCallForHelpScripts)
1429 {
1430 if (onCallForHelpScript.action == actionSpell)
1431 {
1432 castAISpell(onCallForHelpScript.spellId);
1433 }
1434 }
1435
1436 // Send a Chatmessage from our AI Scripts
1437 sendStoredText(mEmotesOnCallForHelp, m_Unit);
1438 }
1439
1440 if (m_Unit->IsInWorld() && m_Unit->isCreature() && static_cast<Creature*>(m_Unit)->GetScript())
1441 static_cast<Creature*>(m_Unit)->GetScript()->OnCallForHelp();
1442
1443 // TODO: possibly make the range customizable in creature_ai_scripts if need different radiuses
1444 findFriends(225.0f /* 15 yards */);
1445
1446 m_hasCalledForHelp = true;
1447}
1448
1449bool AIInterface::_findFriendWhileFleeing()
1450{
1451 // Already found a friend
1452 if (m_fleeState == FLEE_SEEK_ASSIST)
1453 return false;
1454
1455 // Radius seems very small in Classic but going with 15 yards
1456 const float fleeRadius = 15.0f;
1457
1458 // m_currentTarget is nullptr at this point
1459 auto* const currentTarget = _selectCurrentTarget();
1460 Creature* helper = nullptr;
1461 float distance = 999999.0f;
1462 for (const auto& itr : m_Unit->getInRangeObjectsSet())
1463 {
1464 if (itr != nullptr && itr->isCreature())
1465 {
1466 auto* candidate = itr->ToCreature();
1467 if (isAlreadyAssisting(candidate) || candidate->getAIInterface()->isAlreadyAssisting(m_Unit))
1468 continue;
1469
1470 const auto distToHelper = m_Unit->getDistanceSq(candidate);
1471 if (distToHelper > (fleeRadius * fleeRadius))
1472 continue;
1473
1474 if (candidate->isInCombat())
1475 continue;
1476
1477 if (!candidate->isHostileTo(currentTarget))
1478 continue;
1479
1480 if (!candidate->getAIInterface()->canOwnerAssistUnit(m_Unit))
1481 continue;
1482
1483 if (worldConfig.terrainCollision.isCollisionEnabled)
1484 {
1485 if (!m_Unit->IsWithinLOSInMap(candidate))
1486 continue;
1487 }
1488
1489 // Find the closest candidate
1490 if (distToHelper > distance)
1491 continue;
1492
1493 distance = distToHelper;
1494 helper = candidate;
1495 }
1496 }
1497
1498 if (helper == nullptr)
1499 return false;
1500
1501 // Only remove fleeing movement generator and run towards helper
1502 m_fleeState = FLEE_SEEK_ASSIST;
1503 m_Unit->sendChatMessage(CHAT_MSG_MONSTER_SAY, LANG_UNIVERSAL, "Found helper");
1504 m_Unit->getMovementManager()->remove(FLEEING_MOTION_TYPE);
1505 // Try position unit 5 yards away from helper
1506 auto helperLoc = helper->GetPosition();
1507 helper->GetPoint(helper->getAbsoluteAngle(m_Unit), 5.0f, helperLoc.x, helperLoc.y, helperLoc.z);
1508 m_Unit->getMovementManager()->moveSeekAssistance(helperLoc);
1509 return true;
1510}
1511
1512//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
1513// Spells
1514CreatureAISpellsArray const& AIInterface::getCreatureAISpells() const
1515{
1516 return mCreatureAISpells;
1517}
1518
1519CreatureAISpells* AIInterface::getAISpell(uint32_t spellId) const
1520{
1521 const auto itr = std::find_if(mCreatureAISpells.cbegin(), mCreatureAISpells.cend(), [spellId](const auto& aiSpell) {
1522 return aiSpell->mSpellInfo->getId() == spellId;
1523 });
1524 return itr != mCreatureAISpells.cend() ? itr->get() : nullptr;
1525}
1526
1527CreatureAISpells* AIInterface::addAISpell(uint32_t spellId, float castChance, uint32_t targetType, uint32_t durationInSec/* = 0*/, uint32_t cooldownInSec/* = 0*/, bool forceRemove/* = false*/, bool isTriggered/* = false*/)
1528{
1529 const auto spellInfo = sSpellMgr.getSpellInfo(spellId);
1530 if (spellInfo == nullptr)
1531 {
1532 sLogger.failure("AIInterface::addAISpell : Tried to create AI spell with invalid spell id {}", spellId);
1533 return nullptr;
1534 }
1535
1536 auto spellDuration = durationInSec * 1000;
1537 if (spellDuration == 0)
1538 spellDuration = spellInfo->getSpellDefaultDuration(nullptr);
1539
1540 const auto spellCooldown = cooldownInSec * 1000;
1541
1542 const auto& newAISpell = mCreatureAISpells.emplace_back(std::make_unique<CreatureAISpells>(
1543 spellInfo, castChance, targetType, spellDuration, spellCooldown, forceRemove, isTriggered
1544 ));
1545
1546 newAISpell->setdurationTimer(spellDuration);
1547 newAISpell->setCooldownTimer(spellCooldown);
1548
1549 return newAISpell.get();
1550}
1551
1552void AIInterface::removeAISpell(uint32_t spellId)
1553{
1554 std::erase_if(mCreatureAISpells, [spellId](const auto& spell) {
1555 return spell->mSpellInfo->getId() == spellId;
1556 });
1557}
1558
1559void AIInterface::updateOutOfCombatSpells(unsigned long time_passed)
1560{
1561 mSpellWaitTimer->updateTimer(time_passed);
1562 m_outOfCombatSpellTimer->updateTimer(time_passed);
1563 if (!m_outOfCombatSpellTimer->isTimePassed() || !mSpellWaitTimer->isTimePassed())
1564 return;
1565
1566 for (const auto& aiSpell : mCreatureAISpells)
1567 {
1568 // cleanup exeeded spells
1569 if (_cleanUpExpiredAISpell(aiSpell.get()))
1570 continue;
1571 // Only self or function target spells
1572 if (aiSpell->mTargetType != TARGET_SELF && aiSpell->mTargetType != TARGET_FUNCTION)
1573 continue;
1574 // Skip spells with cooldown longer than duration
1575 if (aiSpell->mCooldown > 0 && aiSpell->mDuration < aiSpell->mCooldown)
1576 continue;
1577 // Check chance
1578 if (!Util::checkChance(aiSpell->mCastChance))
1579 continue;
1580
1581 auto* const spellTarget = aiSpell->mTargetType == TARGET_SELF ?
1582 m_Unit :
1583 aiSpell->getTargetFunction();
1584 if (spellTarget == nullptr)
1585 continue;
1586
1587 // Check if target has this aura with full effects
1588 auto allEffectsOnTarget = false;
1589 for (uint8_t i = 0; i < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS; ++i)
1590 {
1591 if (aiSpell->mSpellInfo->doesEffectApplyAura(i))
1592 {
1593 const auto effName = aiSpell->mSpellInfo->getEffectApplyAuraName(i);
1594 auto foundAurEff = false;
1595 for (const auto& aurEff : spellTarget->getAuraEffectList(static_cast<AuraEffect>(effName)))
1596 {
1597 const auto* aur = aurEff->getAura();
1598 if (aur->getSpellId() != aiSpell->mSpellInfo->getId())
1599 continue;
1600 if (aur->getCasterGuid() == m_Unit->getGuid())
1601 {
1602 foundAurEff = true;
1603 break;
1604 }
1605 }
1606
1607 allEffectsOnTarget = foundAurEff;
1608 // This effect was not on target
1609 if (!allEffectsOnTarget)
1610 break;
1611 }
1612 }
1613 if (allEffectsOnTarget)
1614 continue;
1615
1616 // Spell/aura may be casted
1617 // TODO: make one function castAIspell that sets cooldowns etc and removes duplicate code
1618 // also need to handle cast result
1619 mCurrentSpellTarget = spellTarget;
1620 mLastCastedSpell = aiSpell.get();
1621 m_Unit->castSpell(spellTarget, aiSpell->mSpellInfo, aiSpell->mIsTriggered);
1622 mSpellWaitTimer->resetInterval(AISPELL_GLOBAL_COOLDOWN);
1623 break;
1624 }
1625
1626 m_outOfCombatSpellTimer->resetInterval(AISPELL_GLOBAL_COOLDOWN);
1627}
1628
1629bool AIInterface::_cleanUpExpiredAISpell(CreatureAISpells const* aiSpell) const
1630{
1631 // stop spells and remove aura in case of duration
1632 if (aiSpell->mDurationTimer->isTimePassed() && aiSpell->mForceRemoveAura)
1633 {
1634 m_Unit->interruptSpell(aiSpell->mSpellInfo->getId());
1635 m_Unit->removeAllAurasById(aiSpell->mSpellInfo->getId());
1636 return true;
1637 }
1638
1639 return false;
1640}
1641
1642SpellCastResult AIInterface::castAISpell(CreatureAISpells* aiSpell)
1643{
1644 Unit* target = getCurrentTarget();
1645 SpellCastResult castResult = SPELL_FAILED_ERROR;
1646 switch (aiSpell->mTargetType)
1647 {
1648 case TARGET_SELF:
1649 case TARGET_VARIOUS:
1650 {
1651 castResult = getUnit()->castSpell(getUnit(), aiSpell->mSpellInfo, aiSpell->mIsTriggered);
1652 mLastCastedSpell = aiSpell;
1653 } break;
1654 case TARGET_ATTACKING:
1655 {
1656 castResult = getUnit()->castSpell(target, aiSpell->mSpellInfo, aiSpell->mIsTriggered);
1657 mCurrentSpellTarget = target;
1658 mLastCastedSpell = aiSpell;
1659 } break;
1660 case TARGET_SOURCE:
1661 castResult = getUnit()->castSpellLoc(getUnit()->GetPosition(), aiSpell->mSpellInfo, aiSpell->mIsTriggered);
1662 mLastCastedSpell = aiSpell;
1663 break;
1664 case TARGET_DESTINATION:
1665 {
1666 castResult = getUnit()->castSpellLoc(target->GetPosition(), aiSpell->mSpellInfo, aiSpell->mIsTriggered);
1667 mCurrentSpellTarget = target;
1668 mLastCastedSpell = aiSpell;
1669 } break;
1670 case TARGET_RANDOM_FRIEND:
1671 case TARGET_RANDOM_SINGLE:
1672 case TARGET_RANDOM_DESTINATION:
1673 {
1674 castResult = castSpellOnRandomTarget(aiSpell);
1675 mLastCastedSpell = aiSpell;
1676 } break;
1677 case TARGET_CLOSEST:
1678 {
1679 mCurrentSpellTarget = getBestUnitTarget(TargetFilter_Closest);
1680 mLastCastedSpell = aiSpell;
1681 castResult = getUnit()->castSpell(mCurrentSpellTarget, aiSpell->mSpellInfo, aiSpell->mIsTriggered);
1682 } break;
1683 case TARGET_FURTHEST:
1684 {
1685 mCurrentSpellTarget = getBestUnitTarget(TargetFilter_InRangeOnly, 0.0f, 30.0f);
1686 mLastCastedSpell = aiSpell;
1687 castResult = getUnit()->castSpell(mCurrentSpellTarget, aiSpell->mSpellInfo, aiSpell->mIsTriggered);
1688 } break;
1689 case TARGET_CUSTOM:
1690 {
1691 // nos custom target set, no spell cast.
1692 if (aiSpell->getCustomTarget() != nullptr)
1693 {
1694 mCurrentSpellTarget = aiSpell->getCustomTarget();
1695 mLastCastedSpell = aiSpell;
1696 castResult = getUnit()->castSpell(mCurrentSpellTarget, aiSpell->mSpellInfo, aiSpell->mIsTriggered);
1697 }
1698 } break;
1699 case TARGET_FUNCTION:
1700 {
1701 if (aiSpell->getTargetFunction() != nullptr)
1702 {
1703 mCurrentSpellTarget = aiSpell->getTargetFunction();
1704
1705 if (mCurrentSpellTarget)
1706 {
1707 mLastCastedSpell = aiSpell;
1708 castResult = getUnit()->castSpell(mCurrentSpellTarget, aiSpell->mSpellInfo, aiSpell->mIsTriggered);
1709 }
1710 }
1711 } break;
1712 default:
1713 return castResult;
1714 }
1715
1716 // Temp code to set cooldown -Appled
1717 aiSpell->mDurationTimer->resetInterval(aiSpell->mDuration);
1718 aiSpell->mCooldownTimer->resetInterval(aiSpell->mCooldown);
1719 return castResult;
1720}
1721
1722SpellCastResult AIInterface::castAISpell(uint32_t aiSpellId)
1723{
1724 CreatureAISpells* aiSpell = nullptr;
1725
1726 // Lets find the stored Spellinfo
1727 for (const auto& spell : mCreatureAISpells)
1728 if (spell->mSpellInfo && spell->mSpellInfo->getId() == aiSpellId)
1729 aiSpell = spell.get();
1730
1731 // when no valid Spell is found return
1732 if (!aiSpell)
1733 return SPELL_FAILED_ERROR;
1734
1735 return castAISpell(aiSpell);
1736}

1739{
1740 // Lets find the stored Spellinfo
1741 for (const auto& spell : mCreatureAISpells)
1742 if (spell->mSpellInfo && spell->mSpellInfo->getId() == aiSpell->mSpellInfo->getId())
1743 return true;
1744
1745 return false;
1746}

1750 // Lets find the stored Spellinfo
1751 for (const auto& spell : mCreatureAISpells)
1752 if (spell->mSpellInfo && spell->mSpellInfo->getId() == SpellId)
1753 return true;
1754
1755 return false;
1756}
1757
1758SpellCastResult AIInterface::castSpellOnRandomTarget(CreatureAISpells* AiSpell)
1759{
1760 if (AiSpell == nullptr)
1761 return SPELL_FAILED_ERROR;
1762
1763 // helper for following code
1764 bool isTargetRandFriend = (AiSpell->mTargetType == TARGET_RANDOM_FRIEND ? true : false);
1765
1766 // if we already cast a spell, do not set/cast another one!
1767 if (!getUnit()->isCastingSpell()
1768 && getUnit()->getAIInterface()->getCurrentTarget())
1769 {
1770 // set up targets in range by position, relation and hp range
1771 std::vector<Unit*> possibleUnitTargets;
1772
1773 for (const auto& inRangeObject : getUnit()->getInRangeObjectsSet())
1774 {
1775 if (((isTargetRandFriend && getUnit()->isFriendlyTo(inRangeObject))
1776 || (!isTargetRandFriend && getUnit()->isHostileTo(inRangeObject) && inRangeObject != getUnit())) && inRangeObject->isCreatureOrPlayer())
1777 {
1778 Unit* inRangeTarget = static_cast<Unit*>(inRangeObject);
1779
1780 if (
1781 inRangeTarget->isAlive() && AiSpell->isDistanceInRange(getUnit()->GetDistance2dSq(inRangeTarget))
1782 && ((AiSpell->isHpInPercentRange(inRangeTarget->getHealthPct()) && isTargetRandFriend)
1783 || (getUnit()->getThreatManager().getThreat(inRangeTarget) > 0 && getUnit()->isHostileTo(inRangeTarget))))
1784 {
1785 possibleUnitTargets.push_back(inRangeTarget);
1786 }
1787 }
1788 }
1789
1790 // add us as a friendly target.
1791 if (AiSpell->isHpInPercentRange(getUnit()->getHealthPct()) && isTargetRandFriend)
1792 possibleUnitTargets.push_back(getUnit());
1793
1794 // no targets in our range for hp range and firendly targets
1795 if (possibleUnitTargets.empty())
1796 return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_IMPLICIT_TARGETS;
1797
1798 // get a random target
1799 uint32_t randomIndex = Util::getRandomUInt(0, static_cast<uint32_t>(possibleUnitTargets.size() - 1));
1800 Unit* randomTarget = possibleUnitTargets[randomIndex];
1801
1802 if (randomTarget == nullptr)
1803 return SPELL_FAILED_BAD_IMPLICIT_TARGETS;
1804
1805 SpellCastResult castResult = SPELL_FAILED_ERROR;
1806 switch (AiSpell->mTargetType)
1807 {
1808 case TARGET_RANDOM_FRIEND:
1809 case TARGET_RANDOM_SINGLE:
1810 {
1811 castResult = getUnit()->castSpell(randomTarget, AiSpell->mSpellInfo, AiSpell->mIsTriggered);
1812 mCurrentSpellTarget = randomTarget;
1813 } break;
1814 case TARGET_RANDOM_DESTINATION:
1815 castResult = getUnit()->castSpellLoc(randomTarget->GetPosition(), AiSpell->mSpellInfo, AiSpell->mIsTriggered);
1816 break;
1817 }
1818
1819 possibleUnitTargets.clear();
1820 return castResult;
1821 }
1822
1823 return SPELL_FAILED_ERROR;
1824}
1825
1826void AIInterface::eventAiInterfaceParamsetFinish()
1827{
1828 if (timed_emotes && timed_emotes->begin() != timed_emotes->end())
1829 {
1830 next_timed_emote = timed_emotes->begin();
1831 timed_emote_expire = (*next_timed_emote)->expire_after;
1832 }
1833}
1834
1835void AIInterface::updateAgent(uint32_t p_time)
1836{
1837 if (getUnit()->isCreature() && static_cast<Creature*>(getUnit())->GetCreatureProperties()->Type == UNIT_TYPE_CRITTER && static_cast<Creature*>(getUnit())->GetType() != CREATURE_TYPE_GUARDIAN)
1838 return;
1839
1840 if (getUnit()->getWorldMap() == nullptr)
1841 return;
1842
1843 if (getUnit()->isCastingSpell())
1844 return;
1845
1846 if (!getCurrentTarget())
1847 return;
1848
1849 spellEvents.updateEvents(p_time, AGENT_SPELL);
1850
1851 if (getUnit()->hasUnitStateFlag(UNIT_STATE_STUNNED | UNIT_STATE_CONFUSED | UNIT_STATE_POLYMORPHED | UNIT_STATE_EVADING))
1852 return;
1853
1854 // Do not update combat if unit is feared
1855 // but update if the fear is self caused by on low health fleeing
1856 if (getUnit()->hasUnitStateFlag(UNIT_STATE_FLEEING) && m_fleeTimer->getExpireTime() <= 0)
1857 return;
1858
1859 // Selects Current Agent Type For Unit
1860 uint32_t spellId = spellEvents.getFinishedEvent();
1861 selectCurrentAgent(getCurrentTarget(), spellId);
1862
1863 // Handle Different Agent Types
1864 switch (getCurrentAgent())
1865 {
1866 case AGENT_MELEE:
1867 {
1868 handleAgentMelee();
1869 } break;
1870 case AGENT_RANGED:
1871 {
1872 handleAgentRanged();
1873 } break;
1874 case AGENT_SPELL:
1875 {
1876 handleAgentSpell(spellId);
1877 } break;
1878 case AGENT_FLEE:
1879 {
1880 handleAgentFlee(p_time);
1881 } break;
1882 case AGENT_CALLFORHELP:
1883 {
1884 handleAgentCallForHelp();
1885 } break;
1886 default:
1887 break;
1888 }
1889}
1890
1891void AIInterface::handleAgentMelee()
1892{
1893 if (getUnit()->isWithinCombatRange(getCurrentTarget(), getUnit()->getMeleeRange(getCurrentTarget()))) // Target is in Range -> Attack
1894 {
1895 bool infront = getUnit()->isInFront(getCurrentTarget());
1896
1897 if (!infront) // set InFront
1898 {
1899 //prevent mob from rotating while stunned
1900 if (!getUnit()->isStunned())
1901 {
1902 getUnit()->setFacingToObject(getCurrentTarget());
1903 infront = true;
1904 }
1905 }
1906 else
1907 {
1908 // Mainhand
1909 if (getUnit()->isAttackReady(MELEE))
1910 {
1911 getUnit()->resetAttackTimer(MELEE);
1912 if (getUnit()->getOnMeleeSpell() != 0)
1913 getUnit()->castOnMeleeSpell();
1914 else
1915 getUnit()->strike(getCurrentTarget(), MELEE, NULL, 0, 0, 0, false, false);
1916
1917 if (getUnit()->canDualWield())
1918 {
1919 // NPCs always seem to wait 50% of attack timer before doing attack on other hand
1920 const auto halfAttackSpeed = static_cast<uint32_t>(getUnit()->getBaseAttackTime(OFFHAND) * getUnit()->getAttackSpeedModifier(OFFHAND) * 0.5f);
1921 const auto msTime = Util::getMSTime();
1922 if (getUnit()->getAttackTimer(OFFHAND) < msTime || (getUnit()->getAttackTimer(OFFHAND) - msTime) < halfAttackSpeed)
1923 getUnit()->setAttackTimer(OFFHAND, halfAttackSpeed);
1924 }
1925 }
1926
1927 // Offhand
1928 if (getUnit()->canDualWield() && getUnit()->isAttackReady(OFFHAND))
1929 {
1930 getUnit()->resetAttackTimer(OFFHAND);
1931 getUnit()->strike(getCurrentTarget(), OFFHAND, NULL, 0, 0, 0, false, false);
1932
1933 // NPCs always seem to wait 50% of attack timer before doing attack on other hand
1934 const auto halfAttackSpeed = static_cast<uint32_t>(getUnit()->getBaseAttackTime(MELEE) * getUnit()->getAttackSpeedModifier(MELEE) * 0.5f);
1935 const auto msTime = Util::getMSTime();
1936 if (getUnit()->getAttackTimer(MELEE) < msTime || (getUnit()->getAttackTimer(MELEE) - msTime) < halfAttackSpeed)
1937 getUnit()->setAttackTimer(MELEE, halfAttackSpeed);
1938 }
1939 }
1940 }
1941}
1942
1943void AIInterface::handleAgentRanged()
1944{
1945 float combatReach[2]; // Calculate Combat Reach
1946 float distance = m_Unit->CalcDistance(getCurrentTarget());
1947
1948 combatReach[0] = 8.0f;
1949 combatReach[1] = 30.0f;
1950
1951 if (distance >= combatReach[0] && distance <= combatReach[1]) // Target is in Range -> Attack
1952 {
1953 if (m_Unit->isAttackReady(RANGED) && !getUnit()->isInEvadeMode())
1954 {
1955 bool infront = m_Unit->isInFront(getCurrentTarget());
1956
1957 if (!infront) // set InFront
1958 {
1959 //prevent mob from rotating while stunned
1960 if (!m_Unit->isStunned())
1961 {
1962 getUnit()->setFacingToObject(getCurrentTarget());
1963 infront = true;
1964 }
1965 }
1966
1967 if (infront)
1968 {
1969 m_Unit->setAttackTimer(RANGED, m_Unit->getBaseAttackTime(RANGED));
1970 SpellInfo const* info = sSpellMgr.getSpellInfo(SPELL_RANGED_GENERAL);
1971 if (info)
1972 {
1973 Spell* sp = sSpellMgr.newSpell(m_Unit, info, false, NULL);
1974 SpellCastTargets targets(getCurrentTarget()->getGuid());
1975 sp->prepare(&targets);
1976 }
1977 }
1978 }
1979 }
1980}
1981
1982void AIInterface::handleAgentSpell(uint32_t spellId)
1983{
1984 auto AIspell = getSpell(spellId);
1985 bool canCastSpell = false;
1986
1987 if (AIspell->agent == AGENT_SPELL)
1988 {
1989 if (AIspell->spellType == STYPE_BUFF)
1990 {
1991 // cast the buff at requested percent only if we don't have it already
1992 if (Util::checkChance(AIspell->procChance))
1993 {
1994 if (!m_Unit->hasAurasWithId(AIspell->spell->getId()))
1995 {
1996 canCastSpell = true;
1997 }
1998 }
1999 }
2000 else
2001 {
2002 // cast the spell at requested percent.
2003 if (Util::checkChance(AIspell->procChance))
2004 {
2005 //focus/mana requirement
2006 switch (AIspell->spell->getPowerType())
2007 {
2008 case POWER_TYPE_MANA:
2009 {
2010 if (m_Unit->getPower(POWER_TYPE_MANA) > AIspell->spell->getManaCost())
2011 canCastSpell = true;
2012 }
2013 break;
2014 case POWER_TYPE_FOCUS:
2015 {
2016 if (m_Unit->getPower(POWER_TYPE_FOCUS) > AIspell->spell->getManaCost())
2017 canCastSpell = true;
2018 }
2019 break;
2020 }
2021 }
2022 }
2023 }
2024
2025 const auto maxRange = getSpellEntry(spellId)->getMaxRange();
2026 if (canCastSpell && (maxRange == 0.0f || getUnit()->isWithinCombatRange(getCurrentTarget(), maxRange)))
2027 {
2028 SpellInfo const* spellInfo = getSpellEntry(spellId);
2029 auto targettype = AIspell->spelltargetType;
2030 SpellCastTargets targets = setSpellTargets(spellInfo, getCurrentTarget(), targettype);
2031
2032 switch (targettype)
2033 {
2034 case TTYPE_CASTER:
2035 case TTYPE_SINGLETARGET:
2036 {
2037 castSpell(getUnit(), spellInfo, targets);
2038 }
2039 break;
2040 case TTYPE_SOURCE:
2041 {
2042 getUnit()->castSpellLoc(targets.getSource(), spellInfo, true);
2043 }
2044 break;
2045 case TTYPE_DESTINATION:
2046 {
2047 getUnit()->castSpellLoc(targets.getDestination(), spellInfo, true);
2048 }
2049 break;
2050 default:
2051 sLogger.failure("AI Agents: Targettype of AI agent spell {} for creature {} not set", spellInfo->getId(), static_cast<Creature*>(getUnit())->GetCreatureProperties()->Id);
2052 }
2053 }
2054 uint32_t casttime = (GetCastTime(sSpellCastTimesStore.lookupEntry(AIspell->spell->getCastingTimeIndex())) ? GetCastTime(sSpellCastTimesStore.lookupEntry(AIspell->spell->getCastingTimeIndex())) : 500);
2055 const auto cooldown = static_cast<int32_t>(AIspell->cooldown ? AIspell->cooldown : 500);
2056 // Delay all Spells by our casttime
2057 spellEvents.delayAllEvents(casttime, AGENT_SPELL);
2058 // Re add Spell to scheduler
2059 spellEvents.addEvent(spellId, cooldown, AGENT_SPELL);
2060}
2061
2062void AIInterface::selectCurrentAgent(Unit* target, uint32_t spellid)
2063{
2064 // If mob is currently fleeing
2065 if (m_fleeTimer->getExpireTime() > 0)
2066 {
2067 setCurrentAgent(AGENT_FLEE);
2068 return;
2069 }
2070
2071 if (this->isMeleeDisabled() && getCurrentAgent() == AGENT_MELEE)
2072 setCurrentAgent(AGENT_NULL);
2073
2074 if (this->isRangedDisabled() && getCurrentAgent() == AGENT_RANGED)
2075 setCurrentAgent(AGENT_NULL);
2076
2077 if (this->isCastDisabled() && getCurrentAgent() == AGENT_SPELL)
2078 setCurrentAgent(AGENT_NULL);
2079
2080 if (target != nullptr && target->isAlive() && !getUnit()->isInEvadeMode())
2081 {
2082 if (canFlee())
2083 {
2084 setCurrentAgent(AGENT_FLEE);
2085 return;
2086 }
2087 else if (canCallForHelp())
2088 {
2089 setCurrentAgent(AGENT_CALLFORHELP);
2090 return;
2091 }
2092
2093 if (spellid)
2094 {
2095 AI_Spell* m_nextSpell = getSpell(spellid);
2096 if (m_nextSpell->agent != AGENT_NULL)
2097 {
2098 setCurrentAgent(AI_Agent(m_nextSpell->agent));
2099 }
2100 else if (!isMeleeDisabled())
2101 {
2102 setCurrentAgent(AGENT_MELEE);
2103 }
2104 }
2105 else if (!isMeleeDisabled())
2106 {
2107 setCurrentAgent(AGENT_MELEE);
2108 }
2109
2110 if (getCurrentAgent() == AGENT_RANGED || getCurrentAgent() == AGENT_MELEE)
2111 {
2112 if (m_canRangedAttack && !isRangedDisabled())
2113 {
2114 setCurrentAgent(AGENT_MELEE);
2115 if (target->isPlayer())
2116 {
2117 float dist = m_Unit->getDistanceSq(target);
2118 if (target->hasUnitMovementFlag(MOVEFLAG_ROOTED) || dist >= 64.0f)
2119 {
2120 setCurrentAgent(AGENT_RANGED);
2121 }
2122 }
2123 else if (target->m_canMove == false || m_Unit->getDistanceSq(target) >= 64.0f)
2124 {
2125 setCurrentAgent(AGENT_RANGED);
2126 }
2127 }
2128 else if (!isMeleeDisabled())
2129 {
2130 setCurrentAgent(AGENT_MELEE);
2131 }
2132 }
2133 }
2134}

2153 }
2154 }

2214
2215SpellCastTargets AIInterface::setSpellTargets(SpellInfo const* /*spellInfo*/, Unit* target,uint8_t targettype) const
2216{
2217 SpellCastTargets targets;
2218 targets.setGameObjectTarget(0);
2219 targets.setUnitTarget(target ? target->getGuid() : 0);
2220 targets.setItemTarget(0);
2221 targets.setSource(m_Unit->GetPosition());
2222 targets.setDestination(m_Unit->GetPosition());
2223
2224 if (targettype == TTYPE_SINGLETARGET)
2225 {
2226 targets.setTargetMask(TARGET_FLAG_UNIT);
2227 }
2228 else if (targettype == TTYPE_SOURCE)
2229 {
2230 targets.setTargetMask(TARGET_FLAG_SOURCE_LOCATION);
2231 }
2232 else if (targettype == TTYPE_DESTINATION)
2233 {
2234 targets.setTargetMask(TARGET_FLAG_DEST_LOCATION);
2235 if (target)
2236 {
2237 targets.setDestination(target->GetPosition());
2238 }
2239 }
2240 else if (targettype == TTYPE_CASTER)
2241 {
2242 targets.setTargetMask(TARGET_FLAG_UNIT);
2243 targets.setUnitTarget(m_Unit->getGuid());
2244 }
2245
2246 return targets;
2247}
2248
2249float AIInterface::calcCombatRange(Unit* target, bool ranged)
2250{
2251 if (!target)
2252 return 0.0f;
2253
2254 float rang = 0.0f;
2255 if (ranged)
2256 rang = 5.0f;
2257
2258 float selfreach = m_Unit->getCombatReach();
2259 float targetradius = target->getModelHalfSize();
2260 float selfradius = m_Unit->getModelHalfSize();
2261
2262 float range = targetradius + selfreach + selfradius + rang;
2263
2264 return range;
2265}
2266
2267float AIInterface::calcAggroRange(Unit* target)
2268{
2269 if (!m_Unit->canSee(target))
2270 return 0;
2271
2272 // WoW Wiki: the minimum radius seems to be 5 yards, while the maximum range is 45 yards
2273 float maxRadius = 45.0f;
2274 float minRadius = 5.0f;
2275
2276 int32_t levelDifference = getUnit()->getLevel() - target->getLevel();
2277
2278 // The aggro radius for creatures with equal level as the player is 20 yards.
2279 // The combatreach should not get taken into account for the distance so we drop it from the range (see Supremus as expample, its a Big Model with a big CombatReach)
2280 float baseAggroDistance = 20.0f - getUnit()->getCombatReach();
2281
2282 // + - 1 yard for each level difference between player and creature
2283 float aggroRadius = baseAggroDistance + float(levelDifference);
2284
2285 // SPELL_AURA_MOD_DETECT_RANGE
2286 const auto modDetectRange = static_cast<float_t>(target->getDetectRangeMod(m_Unit->getGuid()));
2287 aggroRadius += modDetectRange;
2288 if (target->isPlayer())
2289 {
2290 aggroRadius += static_cast<float_t>(dynamic_cast<Player*>(target)->m_detectedRange);
2291 }
2292
2293 // Check to see if the target is a player mining a node
2294 bool isMining = false;
2295 if (target->isPlayer())
2296 {
2297 if (target->isCastingSpell())
2298 {
2299 // If nearby miners weren't spotted already we'll give them a little surprise.
2300 Spell* sp = target->getCurrentSpell(CURRENT_GENERIC_SPELL);
2301 if (sp != nullptr && sp->getSpellInfo()->getEffect(0) == SPELL_EFFECT_OPEN_LOCK && sp->getSpellInfo()->getEffectMiscValue(0) == LOCKTYPE_MINING)
2302 {
2303 isMining = true;
2304 }
2305 }
2306 }
2307
2308 // If the target is of a much higher level the aggro range must be scaled down, unless the target is mining a nearby resource node
2309 if (levelDifference > 8 && !isMining)
2310 {
2311 aggroRadius += aggroRadius * static_cast<float_t>((levelDifference - 8) * 5 / 100);
2312 }
2313
2314 // Multiply by elite value
2315 if (m_Unit->isCreature() && dynamic_cast<Creature*>(m_Unit)->GetCreatureProperties()->Rank > 0)
2316 {
2317 aggroRadius *= static_cast<float_t>(dynamic_cast<Creature*>(m_Unit)->GetCreatureProperties()->Rank) * 1.50f;
2318 }
2319
2320 // The aggro range of creatures with higher levels than the total player level for the expansion should get the maxlevel treatment
2321 // This makes sure that creatures such as bosses wont have a bigger aggro range than the rest of the npc's
2322 // The following code is used for blizzlike behaivior such as skippable bosses
2323 if (getUnit()->getLevel() > worldConfig.player.playerGeneratedInformationByLevelCap)
2324 aggroRadius = baseAggroDistance + float(worldConfig.player.playerGeneratedInformationByLevelCap - target->getLevel());
2325
2326 // Make sure that we wont go over the total range limits
2327 if (aggroRadius > maxRadius)
2328 aggroRadius = maxRadius;
2329 else if (aggroRadius < minRadius)
2330 aggroRadius = minRadius;
2331
2332 return aggroRadius;
2333}
2334
2335void AIInterface::updateTotem(uint32_t p_time)
2336{
2337 if (totemspell != nullptr)
2338 {
2339 if (p_time >= m_totemspelltimer)
2340 {
2341 Spell* pSpell = sSpellMgr.newSpell(m_Unit, totemspell, true, 0);
2342 Unit* nextTarget = getCurrentTarget();
2343 if (nextTarget == NULL ||
2344 (!m_Unit->getWorldMap()->getUnit(nextTarget->getGuid()) ||
2345 !nextTarget->isAlive() ||
2346 !(m_Unit->isInRange(nextTarget->GetPosition(), pSpell->getSpellInfo()->custom_base_range_or_radius_sqr)) ||
2347 !m_Unit->isValidTarget(nextTarget, pSpell->getSpellInfo())
2348 )
2349 )
2350 {
2351 //we set no target and see if we managed to fid a new one
2352 m_currentTarget = nullptr;
2353 //something happened to our target, pick another one
2354 SpellCastTargets targets(0);
2355 pSpell->GenerateTargets(&targets);
2356 if (targets.getTargetMask() & TARGET_FLAG_UNIT)
2357 m_currentTarget = getUnit()->getWorldMapUnit(targets.getUnitTargetGuid());
2358 }
2359 nextTarget = getCurrentTarget();
2360 if (nextTarget)
2361 {
2362 SpellCastTargets targets(nextTarget->getGuid());
2363 pSpell->prepare(&targets);
2364 // need proper cooldown time!
2365 m_totemspelltimer = m_totemspelltime;
2366 }
2367 else
2368 {
2369 delete pSpell;
2370 pSpell = nullptr;
2371 }
2372 }
2373 else
2374 {
2375 m_totemspelltimer -= p_time;
2376 }
2377 }
2378 else
2379 {
2380 sLogger.failure("AIInterface::updateTotem tried to update invalid totemspell");
2381 }
2382}

2384void AIInterface::setCreatureProtoDifficulty(uint32_t entry)
2385{

2389 auto properties_difficulty = sMySQLStore.getCreatureProperties(creature_difficulty_entry);

2400 getUnit()->setSpeedRate(TYPE_FLY, properties_difficulty->fly_speed, false);
2401

2405

2417 {
2418 getUnit()->setResistance(i, properties_difficulty->Resistances[i]);
2419 }
2420
2421 getUnit()->setBaseAttackTime(MELEE, properties_difficulty->AttackTime);
2422
2423 getUnit()->setMinDamage(properties_difficulty->MinDamage);
2424 getUnit()->setMaxDamage(properties_difficulty->MaxDamage);

2428 getUnit()->setMaxRangedDamage(properties_difficulty->RangedMaxDamage);
2429
2430
2431 getUnit()->setFaction(properties_difficulty->Faction);
2432
2433 if (!(getUnit()->m_factionEntry->RepListId == -1 && getUnit()->m_factionTemplate->HostileMask == 0 && getUnit()->m_factionTemplate->FriendlyMask == 0))
2434 {
2435 m_Unit->getAIInterface()->setCanCallForHelp(true);
2436 }
2437
2438 if (properties_difficulty->CanRanged == 1)
2439 getUnit()->getAIInterface()->m_canRangedAttack = true;
2440 else
2441 getUnit()->m_aiInterface->m_canRangedAttack = false;
2442
2443 getUnit()->setBoundingRadius(properties_difficulty->BoundingRadius);
2444
2445 getUnit()->setCombatReach(properties_difficulty->CombatReach);
2446

2448
2449 // resistances
2450 for (uint8_t j = 0; j < TOTAL_SPELL_SCHOOLS; ++j)
2451 {
2452 getUnit()->m_baseResistance[j] = getUnit()->getResistance(j);
2453 }
2454
2455 for (uint8_t j = 0; j < STAT_COUNT; ++j)
2456 {
2457 getUnit()->m_baseStats[j] = getUnit()->getStat(j);
2458 }
2459
2460 getUnit()->m_baseDamage[0] = getUnit()->getMinDamage();
2461 getUnit()->m_baseDamage[1] = getUnit()->getMaxDamage();
2462 getUnit()->m_baseOffhandDamage[0] = getUnit()->getMinOffhandDamage();
2463 getUnit()->m_baseOffhandDamage[1] = getUnit()->getMaxOffhandDamage();
2464 getUnit()->m_baseRangedDamage[0] = getUnit()->getMinRangedDamage();
2465 getUnit()->m_baseRangedDamage[1] = getUnit()->getMaxRangedDamage();
2466
2467 creature->BaseAttackType = properties_difficulty->attackSchool;
2468
2469 /* // Dont was Used in old AIInterface left the code here if needed at other Date
2470 if (properties_difficulty->guardtype == GUARDTYPE_CITY)
2471 getUnit()->getAIInterface()->setGuard(true);
2472 else
2473 getUnit()->getAIInterface()->setGuard(false);*/
2474
2475 if (properties_difficulty->guardtype == GUARDTYPE_NEUTRAL)
2476 getUnit()->getAIInterface()->setGuard(true);
2477 else
2478 getUnit()->getAIInterface()->setGuard(false);
2479
2480#ifdef FT_VEHICLES
2481 if (getUnit()->isVehicle())
2482 {
2483 getUnit()->createVehicleKit(properties_difficulty->Id, properties_difficulty->vehicleid);
2484 getUnit()->addNpcFlags(UNIT_NPC_FLAG_SPELLCLICK);
2485 getUnit()->setAItoUse(false);

2487#endif
2488

2490 getUnit()->setMoveRoot(true);
2491 }
2492 }
2493}

2549void AIInterface::eventDamageTaken(Unit* pUnit, uint32_t misc1)
2550{
2551 if (getUnit()->isInEvadeMode())
2552 return;
2553
2554 if (pUnit == nullptr)
2555 return;
2556
2557 if (m_Unit->isCreature())
2558 {
2559 // On Damage Taken Scripts
2560 for (auto onDamageTakenScript : onDamageTakenScripts)
2561 {
2562 if (onDamageTakenScript.action == actionSpell)
2563 {
2564 castAISpell(onDamageTakenScript.spellId);
2565 }
2566 }
2567
2568 // Send a Chatmessage from our AI Scripts
2569 sendStoredText(mEmotesOnDamageTaken, pUnit);
2570 }
2571
2572 pUnit->removeAllAurasById(24575);
2573
2574 if (m_Unit->IsInWorld() && m_Unit->isCreature() && static_cast<Creature*>(m_Unit)->GetScript() != nullptr)
2575 static_cast<Creature*>(m_Unit)->GetScript()->OnDamageTaken(pUnit, misc1);
2576}
2577
2578void AIInterface::eventEnterCombat(Unit* pUnit, uint32_t /*misc1*/)
2579{
2580 if (pUnit == nullptr || pUnit->isDead() || m_Unit->isDead())
2581 return;
2582
2583 /* send the message */
2584 if (m_Unit->isCreature())
2585 {
2586 if (const auto creature = dynamic_cast<Creature*>(m_Unit))
2587 {
2588 if (creature->IsInWorld() && m_Unit->isCreature() && creature->GetScript())
2589 {
2590 creature->GetScript()->_internalOnCombatStart(pUnit);
2591 creature->GetScript()->OnCombatStart(pUnit);
2592 }
2593
2594 if (m_Unit->getWorldMap() && m_Unit->getWorldMap()->getScript())
2595 {
2596 // set encounter state = InProgress
2597 uint32_t i = 0;
2598 for (const auto& boss : m_Unit->getWorldMap()->getScript()->getBosses())
2599 {
2600 if (m_Unit->getEntry() == boss.entry)
2601 if (m_Unit->getWorldMap() && m_Unit->getWorldMap()->getScript())
2602 m_Unit->getWorldMap()->getScript()->setBossState(i, InProgress);
2603
2604 i++;
2605 }
2606 }
2607
2608 if (creature->m_spawn && (creature->m_spawn->channel_target_go || creature->m_spawn->channel_target_creature))
2609 {
2610 m_Unit->setChannelSpellId(0);
2611 m_Unit->setChannelObjectGuid(0);
2612 }
2613 }
2614
2615 // Enter Combat Scripts
2616 for (auto onCombatStartScript : onCombatStartScripts)
2617 {
2618 if (onCombatStartScript.action == actionSpell)
2619 {
2620 castAISpell(onCombatStartScript.spellId);
2621 }
2622 }
2623
2624 // Send a Chatmessage from our AI Scripts
2625 sendStoredText(mEmotesOnCombatStart, pUnit);
2626 }
2627
2628 // Stop the emote - change to fight emote
2629 m_Unit->setEmoteState(EMOTE_STATE_READY1H);
2630
2631 // Instance Combat
2632 instanceCombatProgress(true);
2633
2634 // Init Spells
2635 initializeSpells();
2636
2637 // If the Player is in A Group add all Players to the Threat List
2638 initGroupThreat(pUnit);
2639
2640 // Send attack sound if not assisting
2641 if (getUnit()->isCreature() && !m_isEngagedByAssist)
2642 getUnit()->SendAIReaction();
2643
2644 // Put mob into combat animation. Take out weapons and start to look serious :P
2645 m_Unit->smsg_AttackStart(pUnit);
2646}
2647
2648void AIInterface::instanceCombatProgress(bool activate)
2649{
2650 if (getUnit()->getWorldMap() && getUnit()->getWorldMap()->getBaseMap()->isRaid())
2651 {
2652 if (getUnit()->isCreature())
2653 {
2654 if (static_cast<Creature*>(getUnit())->GetCreatureProperties()->Rank == ELITE_WORLDBOSS)
2655 {
2656 if (activate)
2657 getUnit()->getWorldMap()->addCombatInProgress(getUnit()->getGuid());
2658 else
2659 getUnit()->getWorldMap()->removeCombatInProgress(getUnit()->getGuid());
2660 }
2661 }
2662 }
2663}
2664
2665void AIInterface::initGroupThreat(Unit* target)
2666{
2667 if (target->isPlayer() && dynamic_cast<Player*>(target)->isInGroup())
2668 {
2669 const auto group = dynamic_cast<Player*>(target)->getGroup();
2670
2671 group->Lock();
2672 for (uint32_t i = 0; i < group->GetSubGroupCount(); i++)
2673 {
2674 for (const auto& itr : group->GetSubGroup(i)->getGroupMembers())
2675 {
2676 Player* pGroupGuy = sObjectMgr.getPlayer(itr->guid);
2677 if (pGroupGuy && pGroupGuy->isAlive() && m_Unit->getWorldMap() == pGroupGuy->getWorldMap() && pGroupGuy->getDistanceSq(target) <= 40 * 40) //50 yards for now. lets see if it works
2678 {
2679 m_Unit->getThreatManager().addThreat(pGroupGuy, 0.0f, nullptr, true, true);
2680 }
2681 }
2682 }
2683 group->Unlock();
2684 }
2685}
2686
2687void AIInterface::eventLeaveCombat(Unit* /*pUnit*/, uint32_t /*misc1*/)
2688{
2689 if (m_Unit->isCreature())
2690 {
2691 if (m_Unit->isDead())
2692 m_Unit->removeAllAuras();
2693 else
2694 m_Unit->removeAllNegativeAuras();
2695 }
2696
2697 // restart emote
2698 if (m_Unit->isCreature())
2699 {
2700 Creature* creature = static_cast<Creature*>(m_Unit);
2701
2702 if (creature->original_emotestate)
2703 m_Unit->setEmoteState(creature->original_emotestate);
2704 else
2705 m_Unit->setEmoteState(EMOTE_ONESHOT_NONE);
2706
2707 if (creature->m_spawn && (creature->m_spawn->channel_target_go || creature->m_spawn->channel_target_creature))
2708 {
2709 if (creature->m_spawn->channel_target_go)
2710 sEventMgr.AddEvent(creature, &Creature::ChannelLinkUpGO, creature->m_spawn->channel_target_go, EVENT_CREATURE_CHANNEL_LINKUP, 1000, 5, 0);
2711
2712 if (creature->m_spawn->channel_target_creature)
2713 sEventMgr.AddEvent(creature, &Creature::ChannelLinkUpCreature, creature->m_spawn->channel_target_creature, EVENT_CREATURE_CHANNEL_LINKUP, 1000, 5, 0);
2714 }
2715
2716 // Leave Combat Scripts
2717 for (auto onLeaveCombatScript : onLeaveCombatScripts)
2718 {
2719 if (onLeaveCombatScript.action == actionSpell)
2720 {
2721 castAISpell(onLeaveCombatScript.spellId);
2722 }
2723 }
2724
2725 // Send a Chatmessage from our AI Scripts
2726 sendStoredText(mEmotesOnLeaveCombat, nullptr);
2727 }
2728
2729 if (m_Unit->isCreature() && m_Unit->isAlive())
2730 {
2731 if (m_Unit->getWorldMap() && m_Unit->getWorldMap()->getScript())
2732 {
2733 // Reset Instance Data
2734 // set encounter state back to NotStarted
2735 uint32_t i = 0;
2736 for (const auto boss : m_Unit->getWorldMap()->getScript()->getBosses())
2737 {
2738 if (m_Unit->getEntry() == boss.entry)
2739 if (m_Unit->getWorldMap() && m_Unit->getWorldMap()->getScript())
2740 m_Unit->getWorldMap()->getScript()->setBossState(i, NotStarted);
2741
2742 i++;
2743 }
2744 }
2745
2746 // Respawn all Npcs from Current Group if needed
2747 auto data = sMySQLStore.getSpawnGroupDataBySpawn(getUnit()->ToCreature()->getSpawnId());
2748 if (data && data->spawnFlags & SPAWFLAG_FLAG_FULLPACK)
2749 {
2750 if (!m_Unit->getWorldMap()->isUnloadPending())
2751 {
2752 for (auto spawns : data->spawns)
2753 {
2754 if (spawns.second && spawns.second->m_spawn && !spawns.second->isAlive())
2755 spawns.second->Despawn(0, 1000);
2756 }
2757 }
2758 }
2759
2760 // Remount if mounted
2761 Creature* creature = static_cast<Creature*>(m_Unit);
2762 if (creature->m_spawn)
2763 m_Unit->setMountDisplayId(creature->m_spawn->MountedDisplayID);
2764 }
2765
2766 initialiseScripts(getUnit()->getEntry());
2767
2768 // when this leads to errors remove
2769 if (m_Unit->getWorldMap() && m_Unit->getWorldMap()->isUnloadPending())
2770 return;
2771
2772 if (m_Unit->IsInWorld() && m_Unit->isCreature() && dynamic_cast<Creature*>(m_Unit)->GetScript())
2773 {
2774 dynamic_cast<Creature*>(m_Unit)->GetScript()->_internalOnCombatStop();
2775 dynamic_cast<Creature*>(m_Unit)->GetScript()->OnCombatStop(getUnit());
2776 dynamic_cast<Creature*>(m_Unit)->GetScript()->InitOrReset();
2777 }
2778}

2780void AIInterface::eventUnitDied(Unit* pUnit, uint32_t /*misc1*/)
2781{
2782 if (pUnit == nullptr)
2783 return;
2784
2785 pUnit->removeAllNegativeAuras();
2786
2787 if (m_Unit->IsInWorld() && m_Unit->isCreature() && dynamic_cast<Creature*>(m_Unit)->GetScript())
2788 {
2789 dynamic_cast<Creature*>(m_Unit)->GetScript()->_internalOnDied(pUnit);
2790 dynamic_cast<Creature*>(m_Unit)->GetScript()->OnDied(pUnit);
2791 }
2792
2793 if (m_Unit->isCreature())
2794 {
2795 // Died Scripts
2796 for (auto onDiedScript : onDiedScripts)
2797 {
2798 switch (onDiedScript.action)
2799 {
2800 case actionSpell:
2801 {
2802 castAISpell(onDiedScript.spellId);
2803 }
2804 break;
2805 default:
2806 break;
2807 }
2808 }
2809
2810 // Send a Chatmessage from our AI Scripts
2811 sendStoredText(mEmotesOnDied, pUnit);
2812
2813 initialiseScripts(getUnit()->getEntry());
2814
2815 // Script Hook for Summon Died
2816 if (Summon* summon = getUnit()->ToSummon())
2817 {
2818 if (Unit* summoner = summon->getUnitOwner())
2819 {
2820 if (summoner->ToCreature() && summoner->IsInWorld() && summoner->ToCreature()->GetScript())
2821 dynamic_cast<Creature*>(summoner)->GetScript()->OnSummonDies(m_Unit->ToCreature(), pUnit);
2822 }
2823 }
2824
2825 if (m_Unit->getWorldMap() && m_Unit->getWorldMap()->getScript())
2826 m_Unit->getWorldMap()->getScript()->OnCreatureDeath(dynamic_cast<Creature*>(m_Unit), pUnit);
2827 }
2828
2829 m_Unit->setMountDisplayId(0);
2830
2831 InstanceMap* pInstance = nullptr;
2832 auto unitMapMgr = m_Unit->getWorldMap();
2833 if (unitMapMgr)
2834 {
2835 pInstance = unitMapMgr->getInstance();
2836
2837 if (m_Unit->isCreature() && !m_Unit->isPet() && pInstance)
2838 {
2839 Creature* pCreature = static_cast<Creature*>(m_Unit);
2840
2841 if (pInstance->isRaidOrHeroicDungeon())
2842 {
2843 if (pCreature->isDungeonBoss())
2844 pInstance->permBindAllPlayers();
2845 }
2846 else
2847 {
2848 // the reset time is set but not added to the scheduler
2849 // until the players leave the instance
2850 const auto now = Util::getTimeNow();
2851 time_t resettime = now + 2 * HOUR;
2852 if (InstanceSaved* save = sInstanceMgr.getInstanceSave(pCreature->GetInstanceID()))
2853 if (save->getResetTime() < resettime)
2854 save->setResetTime(resettime);
2855 }
2856
2857 if (unitMapMgr->getScript())
2858 {
2859 // Set Instance Data
2860 // set encounter state to Performed
2861 uint32_t i = 0;
2862 for (const auto boss : unitMapMgr->getScript()->getBosses())
2863 {
2864 if (m_Unit->getEntry() == boss.entry)
2865 {
2866 if (unitMapMgr->getScript())
2867 unitMapMgr->getScript()->setBossState(i, Performed);
2868 }
2869 i++;
2870 }
2871 }
2872
2873 // Killed Group checks
2874 auto spawnGroupData = sMySQLStore.getSpawnGroupDataBySpawn(pCreature->spawnid);
2875
2876 // Spawn Group Handling
2877 if (spawnGroupData && spawnGroupData->groupId)
2878 {
2879 bool killed = true;
2880 for (auto spawns : spawnGroupData->spawns)
2881 {
2882 if (!unitMapMgr->getRespawnInfo(SPAWN_TYPE_CREATURE, spawns.first))
2883 killed = false;
2884 }
2885
2886 if (killed)
2887 {
2888 if (unitMapMgr->getScript())
2889 unitMapMgr->getScript()->OnSpawnGroupKilled(spawnGroupData->groupId);
2890 }
2891 }
2892 }
2893
2894 if (unitMapMgr->getBaseMap()->isRaid())
2895 {
2896 if (m_Unit->isCreature())
2897 {
2898 if (dynamic_cast<Creature*>(m_Unit)->GetCreatureProperties()->Rank == 3)

2900 }

2902 }
