3062bool AIInterface::moveTo(float x, float y, float z, float /*o = 0.0f*/, bool running/*= false*/)
3063{
3064 if (m_Unit->isRooted() || m_Unit->isStunned())
3065 {
3066 m_Unit->stopMoving() ; //Just Stop
3067 return false;
3068 }
3069
3070 MovementMgr::MoveSplineInit init(m_Unit);
3071 init.MoveTo(x, y, z);
3072 if (running)
3073 init.SetWalk(false);
3074 else
3075 init.SetWalk(true);
3076
3077 m_Unit->getMovementManager()->launchMoveSpline(std::move(init));
3078
3079 return true;
3080}
3081
3082void AIInterface::calcDestinationAndMove(Unit* target, float dist)
3083{
3084 if (m_Unit->isRooted() || m_Unit->isStunned())
3085 {
3086 m_Unit->stopMoving(); //Just Stop
3087 return;
3088 }
3089
3090 float newx, newy, newz;
3091
3092 if (target != nullptr)
3093 {
3094 newx = target->GetPositionX();
3095 newy = target->GetPositionY();
3096 newz = target->GetPositionZ();
3097
3098 //avoid eating bandwidth with useless movement packets when target did not move since last position
3099 //this will work since it turned into a common myth that when you pull mob you should not move :D
3100 if (abs(m_lasttargetPosition.x - newx) < MIN_WALK_DISTANCE
3101 && abs(m_lasttargetPosition.y - newy) < MIN_WALK_DISTANCE)
3102 return;
3103
3104 m_lasttargetPosition.x = newx;
3105 m_lasttargetPosition.y = newy;
3106
3107 float angle = m_Unit->calcAngle(m_Unit->GetPositionX(), m_Unit->GetPositionY(), newx, newy) * M_PI_FLOAT / 180.0f;
3108 float x = dist * cosf(angle);
3109 float y = dist * sinf(angle);
3110
3111 if (target->isPlayer() && static_cast<Player*>(target)->isMoving())
3112 {
3113 // cater for moving player vector based on orientation
3114 x -= cosf(target->GetOrientation());
3115 y -= sinf(target->GetOrientation());
3116 }
3117
3118 newx -= x;
3119 newy -= y;
3120 }
3121 else
3122 {
3123 newx = m_Unit->GetPositionX();
3124 newy = m_Unit->GetPositionY();
3125 newz = m_Unit->GetPositionZ();
3126 }
3127
3128 MovementMgr::MoveSplineInit init(m_Unit);
3129 init.MoveTo(newx, newy, newz);
3130 init.SetWalk(true);
3131 m_Unit->getMovementManager()->launchMoveSpline(std::move(init));
3132}

3157void AIInterface::setWayPointToMove(uint32_t waypointId)
3158{
3159 auto _path = sWaypointMgr->getPath(getUnit()->ToCreature()->getWaypointPath());
3160 WaypointNode const &waypoint = _path->nodes[waypointId];
3161
3162 MovementMgr::MoveSplineInit init(getUnit());
3163 init.MoveTo(waypoint.x, waypoint.y, waypoint.z);
3164
3165 //! Accepts angles such as 0.00001 and -0.00001, 0 must be ignored, default value in waypoint table
3166 if (waypoint.orientation && waypoint.delay)
3167 init.SetFacing(waypoint.orientation);
3168
3169 switch (waypoint.moveType)
3170 {
3171#if VERSION_STRING >= WotLK
3172 case WAYPOINT_MOVE_TYPE_LAND:
3173 init.SetAnimation(ANIMATION_FLAG_GROUND);
3174 break;
3175 case WAYPOINT_MOVE_TYPE_TAKEOFF:
3176 init.SetAnimation(ANIMATION_FLAG_HOVER);
3177 break;
3178#endif
3179 case WAYPOINT_MOVE_TYPE_RUN:
3180 init.SetWalk(false);
3181 break;
3182 case WAYPOINT_MOVE_TYPE_WALK:
3183 init.SetWalk(true);
3184 break;
3185 default:
3186 break;
3187 }
3188
3189 init.Launch();
3190}

3200 return false;

3278
3279bool AIInterface::canCreatePath(float x, float y, float z)
3280{
3281 //make sure current spline is updated
3282 MMAP::MMapManager* mmap = MMAP::MMapFactory::createOrGetMMapManager();
3283 dtNavMesh* nav = const_cast<dtNavMesh*>(mmap->GetNavMesh(m_Unit->GetMapId()));
3284 dtNavMeshQuery* nav_query = const_cast<dtNavMeshQuery*>(mmap->GetNavMeshQuery(m_Unit->GetMapId(), m_Unit->GetInstanceID()));
3285 //NavMeshData* nav = CollideInterface.GetNavMesh(m_Unit->GetMapId());
3286
3287 if (nav == nullptr)
3288 return false;
3289
3290 float start[VERTEX_SIZE] = { m_Unit->GetPositionY(), m_Unit->GetPositionZ(), m_Unit->GetPositionX() };
3291 float end[VERTEX_SIZE] = { y, z, x };
3292 float extents[VERTEX_SIZE] = { 3.0f, 5.0f, 3.0f };
3293 float closest_point[VERTEX_SIZE] = { 0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f };
3294
3295 dtQueryFilter filter;
3296 filter.setIncludeFlags(NAV_GROUND | NAV_WATER | NAV_MAGMA_SLIME);
3297
3298 dtPolyRef startref, endref;
3299
3300 if (dtStatusFailed(nav_query->findNearestPoly(start, extents, &filter, &startref, closest_point)))
3301 return false;
3302
3303 if (dtStatusFailed(nav_query->findNearestPoly(end, extents, &filter, &endref, closest_point)))
3304 return false;
3305
3306 if (startref == 0 || endref == 0)
3307 return false;
3308
3309 dtPolyRef path[256];
3310 int pathcount;
3311
3312 if (dtStatusFailed(nav_query->findPath(startref, endref, start, end, &filter, path, &pathcount, 256)))
3313 return false;
3314
3315 if (pathcount == 0 || path[pathcount - 1] != endref)
3316 return false;
3317
3318 float points[MAX_PATH_LENGTH * 3];
3319 uint32_t pointcount;
3320 bool usedoffmesh;
3321
3322 if (dtStatusFailed(findSmoothPath(start, end, path, pathcount, points, &pointcount, usedoffmesh, MAX_PATH_LENGTH, nav, nav_query, filter)))
3323 return false;
3324
3325 return true;
3326}
3327
3328dtStatus AIInterface::findSmoothPath(const float* startPos, const float* endPos, const dtPolyRef* polyPath, const uint32_t polyPathSize, float* smoothPath, uint32_t* smoothPathSize, bool & usedOffmesh, const uint32_t maxSmoothPathSize, dtNavMesh* mesh, dtNavMeshQuery* query, dtQueryFilter & filter)
3329{
3330 *smoothPathSize = 0;
3331 uint32_t nsmoothPath = 0;
3332 usedOffmesh = false;
3333
3334 dtPolyRef polys[MAX_PATH_LENGTH];
3335 memcpy(polys, polyPath, sizeof(dtPolyRef)*polyPathSize);
3336 uint32_t npolys = polyPathSize;
3337
3338 float iterPos[VERTEX_SIZE], targetPos[VERTEX_SIZE];
3339 if (dtStatusFailed(query->closestPointOnPolyBoundary(polys[0], startPos, iterPos)))
3340 return DT_FAILURE | DT_OUT_OF_MEMORY;
3341
3342 if (dtStatusFailed(query->closestPointOnPolyBoundary(polys[npolys - 1], endPos, targetPos)))
3343 return DT_FAILURE | DT_OUT_OF_MEMORY;
3344
3345 dtVcopy(&smoothPath[nsmoothPath * VERTEX_SIZE], iterPos);
3346 nsmoothPath++;
3347
3348 // Move towards target a small advancement at a time until target reached or
3349 // when ran out of memory to store the path.
3350 while (npolys && nsmoothPath < maxSmoothPathSize)
3351 {
3352 // Find location to steer towards.
3353 float steerPos[VERTEX_SIZE];
3354 unsigned char steerPosFlag;
3355 dtPolyRef steerPosRef = 0;
3356
3357 if (!getSteerTarget(iterPos, targetPos, SMOOTH_PATH_SLOP, polys, npolys, steerPos, steerPosFlag, steerPosRef, query))
3358 break;
3359
3360 bool endOfPath = (steerPosFlag & DT_STRAIGHTPATH_END) != 0;
3361 bool offMeshConnection = (steerPosFlag & DT_STRAIGHTPATH_OFFMESH_CONNECTION) != 0;
3362
3363 // Find movement delta.
3364 float delta[VERTEX_SIZE];
3365 dtVsub(delta, steerPos, iterPos);
3366 float len = dtMathSqrtf(dtVdot(delta, delta));
3367 // If the steer target is end of path or off-mesh link, do not move past the location.
3368 if ((endOfPath || offMeshConnection) && len < SMOOTH_PATH_STEP_SIZE)
3369 len = 1.0f;
3370 else
3371 len = SMOOTH_PATH_STEP_SIZE / len;
3372
3373 float moveTgt[VERTEX_SIZE];
3374 dtVmad(moveTgt, iterPos, delta, len);
3375
3376 // Move
3377 float result[VERTEX_SIZE];
3378 const static uint32_t MAX_VISIT_POLY = 16;
3379 dtPolyRef visited[MAX_VISIT_POLY];
3380
3381 uint32_t nvisited = 0;
3382 query->moveAlongSurface(polys[0], iterPos, moveTgt, &filter, result, visited, (int*)&nvisited, MAX_VISIT_POLY);
3383 npolys = fixupCorridor(polys, npolys, MAX_PATH_LENGTH, visited, nvisited);
3384
3385 query->getPolyHeight(visited[nvisited - 1], result, &result[1]);
3386 dtVcopy(iterPos, result);
3387
3388 // Handle end of path and off-mesh links when close enough.
3389 if (endOfPath && inRangeYZX(iterPos, steerPos, SMOOTH_PATH_SLOP, 2.0f))
3390 {
3391 // Reached end of path.
3392 dtVcopy(iterPos, targetPos);
3393 if (nsmoothPath < maxSmoothPathSize)
3394 {
3395 dtVcopy(&smoothPath[nsmoothPath * VERTEX_SIZE], iterPos);
3396 nsmoothPath++;
3397 }
3398 break;
3399 }
3400 else if (offMeshConnection && inRangeYZX(iterPos, steerPos, SMOOTH_PATH_SLOP, 2.0f))
3401 {
3402 // Reached off-mesh connection.
3403 usedOffmesh = true;
3404
3405 // Advance the path up to and over the off-mesh connection.
3406 dtPolyRef prevRef = 0;
3407 dtPolyRef polyRef = polys[0];
3408 uint32_t npos = 0;
3409 while (npos < npolys && polyRef != steerPosRef)
3410 {
3411 prevRef = polyRef;
3412 polyRef = polys[npos];
3413 npos++;
3414 }
3415
3416 for (uint32_t i = npos; i < npolys; ++i)
3417 {
3418 polys[i - npos] = polys[i];
3419 }
3420
3421 npolys -= npos;
3422
3423 // Handle the connection.
3424 float startPos2[VERTEX_SIZE], endPos2[VERTEX_SIZE];
3425 if (!dtStatusFailed(mesh->getOffMeshConnectionPolyEndPoints(prevRef, polyRef, startPos2, endPos2)))
3426 {
3427 if (nsmoothPath < maxSmoothPathSize)
3428 {
3429 dtVcopy(&smoothPath[nsmoothPath * VERTEX_SIZE], startPos2);
3430 nsmoothPath++;
3431 }
3432 // Move position at the other side of the off-mesh link.
3433 dtVcopy(iterPos, endPos2);
3434 query->getPolyHeight(polys[0], iterPos, &iterPos[1]);
3435 }
3436 }
3437
3438 // Store results.
3439 if (nsmoothPath < maxSmoothPathSize)
3440 {
3441 dtVcopy(&smoothPath[nsmoothPath * VERTEX_SIZE], iterPos);
3442 nsmoothPath++;
3443 }
3444 }
3445
3446 *smoothPathSize = nsmoothPath;
3447
3448 // this is most likely loop
3449 return nsmoothPath < maxSmoothPathSize ? DT_SUCCESS : DT_FAILURE;
3450}
3451
3452bool AIInterface::getSteerTarget(const float* startPos, const float* endPos, const float minTargetDist, const dtPolyRef* path, const uint32_t pathSize, float* steerPos, unsigned char & steerPosFlag, dtPolyRef & steerPosRef, dtNavMeshQuery* query)
3453{
3454 // Find steer target.
3455 static const int32_t MAX_STEER_POINTS = 3;
3456 float steerPath[MAX_STEER_POINTS * VERTEX_SIZE];
3457 unsigned char steerPathFlags[MAX_STEER_POINTS];
3458 dtPolyRef steerPathPolys[MAX_STEER_POINTS];
3459 uint32_t nsteerPath = 0;
3460 dtStatus dtResult = query->findStraightPath(startPos, endPos, path, static_cast<int32_t>(pathSize),
3461 steerPath, steerPathFlags, steerPathPolys, (int*)&nsteerPath, MAX_STEER_POINTS);
3462 if (!nsteerPath || dtStatusFailed(dtResult))
3463 return false;
3464
3465 // Find vertex far enough to steer to.
3466 uint32_t ns = 0;
3467 while (ns < nsteerPath)
3468 {
3469 // Stop at Off-Mesh link or when point is further than slop away.
3470 if ((steerPathFlags[ns] & DT_STRAIGHTPATH_OFFMESH_CONNECTION) || !inRangeYZX(&steerPath[ns * VERTEX_SIZE], startPos, minTargetDist, 1000.0f))
3471 {
3472 break;
3473 }
3474
3475 ns++;
3476 }
3477 // Failed to find good point to steer to.
3478 if (ns >= nsteerPath)
3479 return false;
3480
3481 dtVcopy(steerPos, &steerPath[ns * VERTEX_SIZE]);
3482 steerPos[1] = startPos[1]; // keep Z value
3483 steerPosFlag = steerPathFlags[ns];
3484 steerPosRef = steerPathPolys[ns];
3485
3486 return true;
3487}
3488
3489uint32_t AIInterface::fixupCorridor(dtPolyRef* path, const uint32_t npath, const uint32_t maxPath, const dtPolyRef* visited, const uint32_t nvisited)
3490{
3491 int32_t furthestPath = -1;
3492 int32_t furthestVisited = -1;
3493
3494 // Find furthest common polygon.
3495 for (auto i = static_cast<int32_t>(npath) - 1; i >= 0; --i)
3496 {
3497 bool found = false;
3498 for (auto j = static_cast<int32_t>(nvisited) - 1; j >= 0; --j)
3499 {
3500 if (path[i] == visited[j])
3501 {
3502 furthestPath = i;
3503 furthestVisited = j;
3504 found = true;
3505 }
3506 }
3507
3508 if (found)
3509 break;
3510 }
3511
3512 // If no intersection found just return current path.
3513 if (furthestPath == -1 || furthestVisited == -1)
3514 return npath;
3515
3516 // Concatenate paths.
3517
3518 // Adjust beginning of the buffer to include the visited.
3519 uint32_t req = nvisited - furthestVisited;
3520 uint32_t orig = uint32_t(furthestPath + 1) < npath ? furthestPath + 1 : npath;
3521 uint32_t size = npath - orig > 0 ? npath - orig : 0;
3522 if (req + size > maxPath)
3523 size = maxPath - req;
3524
3525 if (size)
3526 memmove(path + req, path + orig, size * sizeof(dtPolyRef));
3527
3528 // Store visited
3529 for (uint32_t i = 0; i < req; ++i)
3530 {
3531 path[i] = visited[(nvisited - 1) - i];
3532 }
3533
3534 return req + size;
3535}

3722
3723void AIInterface::UpdateAISpells()
3724{
3725 if (mLastCastedSpell)
3726 {
3727 if (!mSpellWaitTimer->isTimePassed())
3728 {
3729 // spell has a min/max range
3730 if (!getUnit()->isCastingSpell() && (mLastCastedSpell->mMaxPositionRangeToCast > 0.0f || mLastCastedSpell->mMinPositionRangeToCast > 0.0f))
3731 {
3732 // if we have a current target and spell is not triggered
3733 if (mCurrentSpellTarget != nullptr && !mLastCastedSpell->mIsTriggered)
3734 {
3735 // interrupt spell if we are not in required range
3736 const float targetDistance = getUnit()->GetPosition().Distance2DSq({ mCurrentSpellTarget->GetPositionX(), mCurrentSpellTarget->GetPositionY() });
3737 if (!mLastCastedSpell->isDistanceInRange(targetDistance))
3738 {
3739 sLogger.debugFlag(AscEmu::Logging::LF_SCRIPT_MGR, "Target outside of spell range ({})! Min: {} Max: {}, distance to Target: {}", mLastCastedSpell->mSpellInfo->getId(), mLastCastedSpell->mMinPositionRangeToCast, mLastCastedSpell->mMaxPositionRangeToCast, targetDistance);
3740 getUnit()->interruptSpell();
3741 mLastCastedSpell = nullptr;
3742 mCurrentSpellTarget = nullptr;
3743 }
3744 }
3745 }
3746 }
3747 else
3748 {
3749 // spell gets not interupted after casttime(duration) so we can send the emote.
3750 mLastCastedSpell->sendRandomEmote(getUnit());
3751
3752 // spell sucessfully castet increase cast Amount
3753 mLastCastedSpell->increaseCastCount();
3754
3755 // override attack stop timer if needed
3756 if (mLastCastedSpell->getAttackStopTimer() != 0)
3757 getUnit()->setAttackTimer(MELEE, mLastCastedSpell->getAttackStopTimer());
3758
3759 mLastCastedSpell = nullptr;
3760 mCurrentSpellTarget = nullptr;
3761 }
3762 }
3763
3764 // cleanup exeeded spells
3765 for (const auto& AISpell : mCreatureAISpells)
3766 {
3767 if (AISpell != nullptr)
3768 {
3769 _cleanUpExpiredAISpell(AISpell.get());
3770 }
3771 }
3772
3773 // cast one spell and check if spell is done (duration)
3774 if (mSpellWaitTimer->isTimePassed())
3775 {
3776 CreatureAISpells* usedSpell = nullptr;
3777
3778 // Shuffle Around our Spells to randomize the cast
3779 if (mCreatureAISpells.size() > 1)
3780 {
3781 Util::randomShuffleVector(mCreatureAISpells);
3782 }
3783
3784 for (const auto& AISpell : mCreatureAISpells)
3785 {
3786 if (AISpell != nullptr)
3787 {
3788 // not on AIUpdate skip
3789 if (AISpell->scriptType != onAIUpdate)
3790 continue;
3791
3792 // spell was casted before, check if the wait time is done
3793 if (!AISpell->mCooldownTimer->isTimePassed())
3794 continue;
3795
3796 // check if creature has Mana/Power required to cast
3797 if(AISpell->mSpellInfo->getPowerType() == POWER_TYPE_MANA)
3798 {
3799 if (AISpell->mSpellInfo->getManaCost() > m_Unit->getPower(POWER_TYPE_MANA))
3800 continue;
3801 }
3802
3803 if (AISpell->mSpellInfo->getPowerType() == POWER_TYPE_FOCUS)
3804 {
3805 if (AISpell->mSpellInfo->getManaCost() > m_Unit->getPower(POWER_TYPE_FOCUS))
3806 continue;
3807 }
3808
3809 // is bound to a specific phase (all greater than 0) if creature has a scripted AI then use its phase
3810 if (getUnit()->ToCreature()->GetScript())
3811 {
3812 if (!AISpell->isAvailableForScriptPhase(getUnit()->ToCreature()->GetScript()->getScriptPhase()))
3813 continue;
3814 }
3815 else
3816 {
3817 if (!AISpell->isAvailableForScriptPhase(internalPhase))
3818 continue;
3819 }
3820
3821 // max Spell cast amount
3822 if (AISpell->getMaxCastCount() && AISpell->getMaxCastCount() <= AISpell->getCastCount())
3823 continue;
3824
3825 // aura stacking
3826 if (getUnit()->getAuraCountForId(AISpell->mSpellInfo->getId()) >= AISpell->getMaxStackCount())
3827 continue;
3828
3829 // hp range
3830 if (!AISpell->isHpInPercentRange(getUnit()->getHealthPct()) && AISpell->mTargetType != TARGET_RANDOM_FRIEND)
3831 continue;
3832
3833 // Check if spell requires current target
3834 if (getCurrentTarget() == nullptr && (AISpell->mTargetType == TARGET_ATTACKING || AISpell->mTargetType == TARGET_DESTINATION))
3835 continue;
3836
3837 // no random chance (cast in script)
3838 if (AISpell->mCastChance == 0.0f)
3839 continue;
3840
3841 // do not cast any spell while stunned/feared/silenced/charmed/confused
3842 if (getUnit()->hasUnitStateFlag(UNIT_STATE_STUNNED | UNIT_STATE_FLEEING | UNIT_STATE_IN_FLIGHT | UNIT_STATE_CHARMED | UNIT_STATE_CONFUSED))
3843 break;
3844
3845 // random chance for shuffeld array should do the job
3846 if (Util::checkChance(AISpell->mCastChance))
3847 {
3848 usedSpell = AISpell.get();
3849 break;
3850 }
3851 else
3852 {
3853 // When we dont had a canche to cast then add the default 1.5sec cooldown for the next cycle
3854 AISpell->setCooldownTimer(1500);
3855 continue;
3856 }
3857 }
3858 }
3859
3860 if (usedSpell != nullptr)
3861 {
3862 Unit* target = getCurrentTarget();
3863 switch (usedSpell->mTargetType)
3864 {
3865 case TARGET_SELF:
3866 case TARGET_VARIOUS:
3867 {
3868 getUnit()->castSpell(getUnit(), usedSpell->mSpellInfo, usedSpell->mIsTriggered);
3869 mLastCastedSpell = usedSpell;
3870 } break;
3871 case TARGET_ATTACKING:
3872 {
3873 getUnit()->castSpell(target, usedSpell->mSpellInfo, usedSpell->mIsTriggered);
3874 mCurrentSpellTarget = target;
3875 mLastCastedSpell = usedSpell;
3876 } break;
3877 case TARGET_DESTINATION:
3878 {
3879 getUnit()->castSpellLoc(target->GetPosition(), usedSpell->mSpellInfo, usedSpell->mIsTriggered);
3880 mCurrentSpellTarget = target;
3881 mLastCastedSpell = usedSpell;
3882 } break;
3883 case TARGET_SOURCE:
3884 {
3885 getUnit()->castSpellLoc(getUnit()->GetPosition(), usedSpell->mSpellInfo, usedSpell->mIsTriggered);
3886 mLastCastedSpell = usedSpell;
3887 } break;
3888 case TARGET_RANDOM_FRIEND:
3889 case TARGET_RANDOM_SINGLE:
3890 case TARGET_RANDOM_DESTINATION:
3891 {
3892 castSpellOnRandomTarget(usedSpell);
3893 mLastCastedSpell = usedSpell;
3894 } break;
3895 // TODO: missing TARGET_CLOSEST and TARGET_FURTHEST
3896 case TARGET_CUSTOM:
3897 {
3898 // nos custom target set, no spell cast.
3899 if (usedSpell->getCustomTarget() != nullptr)
3900 {
3901 mCurrentSpellTarget = usedSpell->getCustomTarget();
3902 mLastCastedSpell = usedSpell;
3903 getUnit()->castSpell(mCurrentSpellTarget, usedSpell->mSpellInfo, usedSpell->mIsTriggered);
3904 }
3905 } break;
3906 case TARGET_FUNCTION:
3907 {
3908 if (usedSpell->getTargetFunction() != nullptr)
3909 {
3910 mCurrentSpellTarget = usedSpell->getTargetFunction();
3911
3912 if (mCurrentSpellTarget)
3913 {
3914 mLastCastedSpell = usedSpell;
3915 getUnit()->castSpell(mCurrentSpellTarget, usedSpell->mSpellInfo, usedSpell->mIsTriggered);
3916 }
3917 }
3918 }
3919 default:
3920 break;
3921 }
3922
3923 // send announcements on casttime beginn
3924 usedSpell->sendAnnouncement(getUnit());
3925
3926 // reset cast wait timer
3927 const auto spellCastTime = GetCastTime(sSpellCastTimesStore.lookupEntry(usedSpell->mSpellInfo->getCastingTimeIndex()));
3928 mSpellWaitTimer->resetInterval(std::max(AISPELL_GLOBAL_COOLDOWN, spellCastTime));
3929
3930 // reset spell timers to cleanup exceeded spells
3931 usedSpell->mDurationTimer->resetInterval(usedSpell->mDuration);
3932 usedSpell->mCooldownTimer->resetInterval(usedSpell->mCooldown);
3933 }
3934 }
3935}
3936
3937Unit* AIInterface::getBestPlayerTarget(TargetFilter pTargetFilter, float pMinRange, float pMaxRange)
3938{
3939 //Build potential target list
3940 UnitArray TargetArray;
3941 for (const auto& PlayerIter : getUnit()->getInRangePlayersSet())
3942 {
3943 if (PlayerIter && isValidUnitTarget(PlayerIter, pTargetFilter, pMinRange, pMaxRange))
3944 TargetArray.push_back(static_cast<Unit*>(PlayerIter));
3945 }
3946
3947 return getBestTargetInArray(TargetArray, pTargetFilter);
3948}
3949
3950Unit* AIInterface::getBestUnitTarget(TargetFilter pTargetFilter, float pMinRange, float pMaxRange)
3951{
3952 //potential target list
3953 UnitArray TargetArray;
3954 if (pTargetFilter & TargetFilter_Friendly)
3955 {
3956 for (const auto& ObjectIter : getUnit()->getInRangeObjectsSet())
3957 {
3958 if (ObjectIter && isValidUnitTarget(ObjectIter, pTargetFilter, pMinRange, pMaxRange))
3959 TargetArray.push_back(static_cast<Unit*>(ObjectIter));
3960 }
3961
3962 if (isValidUnitTarget(getUnit(), pTargetFilter))
3963 TargetArray.push_back(getUnit()); //add self as possible friendly target
3964 }
3965 else
3966 {
3967 for (const auto& ObjectIter : getUnit()->getInRangeOppositeFactionSet())
3968 {
3969 if (ObjectIter && isValidUnitTarget(ObjectIter, pTargetFilter, pMinRange, pMaxRange))
3970 TargetArray.push_back(static_cast<Unit*>(ObjectIter));
3971 }
3972 }
3973
3974 return getBestTargetInArray(TargetArray, pTargetFilter);
3975}
3976
3977Unit* AIInterface::getBestTargetInArray(UnitArray & pTargetArray, TargetFilter pTargetFilter)
3978{
3979 //only one possible target, return it
3980 if (pTargetArray.size() == 1)
3981 return pTargetArray[0];
3982
3983 //closest unit if requested
3984 if (pTargetFilter & TargetFilter_Closest)
3985 return getNearestTargetInArray(pTargetArray);
3986
3987 //second most hated if requested
3988 if (pTargetFilter & TargetFilter_SecondMostHated)
3989 return getSecondMostHatedTargetInArray(pTargetArray);
3990
3991 //random unit in array
3992 return (pTargetArray.size() > 1) ? pTargetArray[Util::getRandomUInt((uint32_t)pTargetArray.size() - 1)] : nullptr;
3993}
3994
3995Unit* AIInterface::getNearestTargetInArray(UnitArray& pTargetArray)
3996{
3997 Unit* NearestUnit = nullptr;
3998
3999 float Distance, NearestDistance = 99999;
4000 for (const auto& UnitIter : pTargetArray)
4001 {
4002 if (UnitIter != nullptr)
4003 {
4004 Distance = getUnit()->CalcDistance(static_cast<Unit*>(UnitIter));
4005 if (Distance < NearestDistance)
4006 {
4007 NearestDistance = Distance;
4008 NearestUnit = UnitIter;
4009 }
4010 }
4011 }
4012
4013 return NearestUnit;
4014}
4015
4016Unit* AIInterface::getSecondMostHatedTargetInArray(UnitArray & pTargetArray)
4017{
4018 Unit* MostHatedUnit = nullptr;
4019 Unit* TargetUnit = nullptr;
4020 Unit* CurrentTarget = static_cast<Unit*>(getCurrentTarget());
4021 uint32_t Threat = 0;
4022 uint32_t HighestThreat = 0;
4023
4024 for (const auto& UnitIter : pTargetArray)
4025 {
4026 if (UnitIter != nullptr)
4027 {
4028 TargetUnit = static_cast<Unit*>(UnitIter);
4029 if (TargetUnit != CurrentTarget)
4030 {
4031 Threat = static_cast<uint32_t>(getUnit()->getThreatManager().getThreat(TargetUnit));
4032 if (Threat > HighestThreat)
4033 {
4034 MostHatedUnit = TargetUnit;
4035 HighestThreat = Threat;
4036 }
4037 }
4038 }
4039 }
4040
4041 return MostHatedUnit;
4042}
4043
4044bool AIInterface::isValidUnitTarget(Object* pObject, TargetFilter pFilter, float pMinRange, float pMaxRange)
4045{
4046 if (!pObject->isCreatureOrPlayer())
4047 return false;
4048
4049 if (pObject->GetInstanceID() != getUnit()->GetInstanceID())
4050 return false;
4051
4052 Unit* UnitTarget = static_cast<Unit*>(pObject);
4053 //Skip dead (if required), feign death or invisible targets
4054 if (pFilter & TargetFilter_Corpse)
4055 {
4056 if (UnitTarget->isAlive() || !UnitTarget->isCreature() || static_cast<Creature*>(UnitTarget)->GetCreatureProperties()->Rank == ELITE_WORLDBOSS)
4057 return false;
4058 }
4059 else if (!UnitTarget->isAlive())
4060 return false;
4061
4062 if (UnitTarget->isPlayer() && static_cast<Player*>(UnitTarget)->m_isGmInvisible)
4063 return false;
4064
4065 if (UnitTarget->hasUnitFlags(UNIT_FLAG_FEIGN_DEATH))
4066 return false;
4067
4068 // if we apply target filtering
4069 if (pFilter != TargetFilter_None)
4070 {
4071 // units not on threat list
4072 if ((pFilter & TargetFilter_Aggroed) && getUnit()->getThreatManager().getThreat(UnitTarget) == 0)
4073 return false;
4074
4075 // current attacking target if requested
4076 if ((pFilter & TargetFilter_NotCurrent) && UnitTarget == getCurrentTarget())
4077 return false;
4078
4079 // only wounded targets if requested
4080 if ((pFilter & TargetFilter_Wounded) && UnitTarget->getHealthPct() >= 99)
4081 return false;
4082
4083 // targets not in melee range if requested
4084 if ((pFilter & TargetFilter_InMeleeRange) && !getUnit()->isWithinCombatRange(UnitTarget, getUnit()->getMeleeRange(UnitTarget)))
4085 return false;
4086
4087 // targets not in strict range if requested
4088 if ((pFilter & TargetFilter_InRangeOnly) && (pMinRange > 0 || pMaxRange > 0))
4089 {
4090 float Range = getUnit()->CalcDistance(UnitTarget);
4091 if (pMinRange > 0 && Range < pMinRange)
4092 return false;
4093
4094 if (pMaxRange > 0 && Range > pMaxRange)
4095 return false;
4096 }
4097
4098 // targets not in Line Of Sight if requested
4099 if ((~pFilter & TargetFilter_IgnoreLineOfSight) && !getUnit()->IsWithinLOSInMap(UnitTarget))
4100 return false;
4101
4102 // hostile/friendly
4103 if ((~pFilter & TargetFilter_Corpse) && (pFilter & TargetFilter_Friendly))
4104 {
4105 if (!UnitTarget->getCombatHandler().isInCombat())
4106 return false; // not-in-combat targets if friendly
4107
4108 if (getUnit()->isHostileTo(UnitTarget) || getUnit()->getThreatManager().getThreat(UnitTarget) > 0)
4109 return false;
4110 }
4111
4112 if ((pFilter & TargetFilter_Current) && UnitTarget != getCurrentTarget())
4113 return false;
4114 }
4115
4116 return true;
4117}
4118
4119void AIInterface::sendStoredText(definedEmoteVector& store, Unit* target)
4120{
4121 float randomChance = Util::getRandomFloat(100.0f);
4122
4123 // Shuffle Around our textIds to randomize it
4124 if (!store.empty())
4125 {
4126 if (store.size() > 1)
4127 Util::randomShuffleVector(store);
4128
4129 for (const auto& mEmotes : store)
4130 {
4131 if (mEmotes->phase && mEmotes->phase != internalPhase)
4132 continue;
4133
4134 if (mEmotes->healthPrecent && static_cast<float>(getUnit()->getHealthPct()) > mEmotes->healthPrecent)
4135 continue;
4136
4137 if (mEmotes->maxCount && mEmotes->count == mEmotes->maxCount)
4138 continue;
4139
4140 if (randomChance < mEmotes->canche)
4141 {
4142 MySQLStructure::NpcScriptText const* npcScriptText = sMySQLStore.getNpcScriptText(mEmotes->textId);
4143 if (npcScriptText != nullptr)
4144 {
4145 getUnit()->sendChatMessage(npcScriptText->type, LANG_UNIVERSAL, npcScriptText->text, target, 0);
4146
4147 if (npcScriptText->sound != 0)
4148 getUnit()->PlaySoundToSet(npcScriptText->sound);
4149 }
4150
4151 ++mEmotes->count;
4152
4153 break;
4154 }
4155 }
4156 }
4157}
